9117681Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic enum StateDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    New,Di2015NewLine    Filled,Di2015NewLine    Shipping,Di2015NewLine    Cancelled,Di2015NewLine    CompletedDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9117681Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic enum TriggerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Filled,Di2015NewLine    Cancelled,Di2015NewLine    ToBeShipped,Di2015NewLine    CompletedDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9117681Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class OrderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly StateMachine<State, Trigger> _stateMachine;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Order()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _stateMachine = CreateStateMachine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool TryUpdateOrderStatus(Trigger trigger)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!_stateMachine.CanFire(trigger))Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _stateMachine.Fire(trigger);Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public State StatusDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _stateMachine.State;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private StateMachine<State, Trigger> CreateStateMachine()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StateMachine<State, Trigger> stateMachine = new StateMachine<State, Trigger>(State.New);Di2015NewLine        stateMachine.Configure(State.New)Di2015NewLine            .Permit(Trigger.Filled, State.Filled)Di2015NewLine            .Permit(Trigger.Cancelled, State.Cancelled);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        stateMachine.Configure(State.Filled)Di2015NewLine            .Permit(Trigger.ToBeShipped, State.Shipping)Di2015NewLine            .Permit(Trigger.Cancelled, State.Cancelled);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        stateMachine.Configure(State.Shipping)Di2015NewLine            .Permit(Trigger.Completed, State.Completed);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        stateMachine.OnUnhandledTrigger((state, trigger) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Unhandled: '{0}' state, '{1}' trigger!");Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine        return stateMachine;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9120726Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate const int MaxRetryCount = 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static T RestoreConnectionAndExecute<T>(SqlCommand command, Func<SqlCommand, T> func)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int retryCount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (retryCount++ < MaxRetryCount)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (command.Connection.State == ConnectionState.Closed)Di2015NewLine                command.Connection.Open();Di2015NewLine            return func(command);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch(Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(!e.Message.ToLower().Contains("transport-level error has occurred"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    throw new Exception("Failed to restore connection for command:"+command.CommandText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static SqlDataReader RestoreConnectionAndExecuteReader(SqlCommand command)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return RestoreConnectionAndExecute(command, c => c.ExecuteReader());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static int RestoreConnectionAndExecuteNonQuery(SqlCommand command)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return RestoreConnectionAndExecute(command, c => c.ExecuteNonQuery());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9132775Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal static class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Expression<Func<Model, Foo>> expression1 = m => m.SubModel.Foo;Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<Foo, string>> expression2 = f => f.Bar.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var swap = new SwapVisitor(expression2.Parameters[0], expression1.Body);Di2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<Model, string>>(Di2015NewLine               swap.Visit(expression2.Body), expression1.Parameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // test it workedDi2015NewLine        var func = lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine        Model test = new Model {SubModel = new SubModel {Foo = new Foo {Di2015NewLine             Bar = new Bar { Value = "abc"}}}};Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(func(test)); // "abc"Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass SwapVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Expression from, to;Di2015NewLine    public SwapVisitor(Expression from, Expression to)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.from = from;Di2015NewLine        this.to = to;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override Expression Visit(Expression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         return node == from ? to : base.Visit(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9143627Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class HttpForm {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Dictionary<string, string> _files = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<string, string> _values = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public HttpForm(string url) {Di2015NewLine        this.Url = url;Di2015NewLine        this.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Method { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Url { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //return self so that we can chainDi2015NewLine    public HttpForm AttachFile(string field, string fileName) {Di2015NewLine        _files[field] = fileName;Di2015NewLine        return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public HttpForm ResetForm(){Di2015NewLine        _files.Clear();Di2015NewLine        _values.Clear();Di2015NewLine        return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //return self so that we can chainDi2015NewLine    public HttpForm SetValue(string field, string value) {Di2015NewLine        _values[field] = value;Di2015NewLine        return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public HttpWebResponse Submit() {Di2015NewLine        return this.UploadFiles(_files, _values);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private HttpWebResponse UploadFiles(Dictionary<string, string> files, Dictionary<string, string> otherValues) {Di2015NewLine        var req = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(this.Url);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        req.Timeout = 10000 * 1000;Di2015NewLine        req.Accept = "text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8";Di2015NewLine        req.AllowAutoRedirect = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var mimeParts = new List<MimePart>();Di2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            if (otherValues != null) {Di2015NewLine                foreach (var fieldName in otherValues.Keys) {Di2015NewLine                    var part = new MimePart();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    part.Headers["Content-Disposition"] = "form-data; name=\\"" + fieldName + "\\"";Di2015NewLine                    part.Data = new MemoryStream(Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(otherValues[fieldName]));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    mimeParts.Add(part);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (files != null) {Di2015NewLine                foreach (var fieldName in files.Keys) {Di2015NewLine                    var part = new MimePart();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    part.Headers["Content-Disposition"] = "form-data; name=\\"" + fieldName + "\\"; filename=\\"" + files[fieldName] + "\\"";Di2015NewLine                    part.Headers["Content-Type"] = "application/octet-stream";Di2015NewLine                    part.Data = File.OpenRead(files[fieldName]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    mimeParts.Add(part);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string boundary = "----------" + DateTime.Now.Ticks.ToString("x");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            req.ContentType = "multipart/form-data; boundary=" + boundary;Di2015NewLine            req.Method = this.Method;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            long contentLength = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] _footer = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes("--" + boundary + "--\\r\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (MimePart part in mimeParts) {Di2015NewLine                contentLength += part.GenerateHeaderFooterData(boundary);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            req.ContentLength = contentLength + _footer.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = new byte[8192];Di2015NewLine            byte[] afterFile = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes("\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine            int read;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (Stream s = req.GetRequestStream()) {Di2015NewLine                foreach (MimePart part in mimeParts) {Di2015NewLine                    s.Write(part.Header, 0, part.Header.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    while ((read = part.Data.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine                        s.Write(buffer, 0, read);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    part.Data.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    s.Write(afterFile, 0, afterFile.Length);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                s.Write(_footer, 0, _footer.Length);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var res = (HttpWebResponse)req.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return res;Di2015NewLine        } catch (Exception ex) {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine            foreach (MimePart part in mimeParts)Di2015NewLine                if (part.Data != null)Di2015NewLine                    part.Data.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return (HttpWebResponse)req.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class MimePart {Di2015NewLine        private NameValueCollection _headers = new NameValueCollection();Di2015NewLine        public NameValueCollection Headers { get { return _headers; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public byte[] Header { get; protected set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public long GenerateHeaderFooterData(string boundary) {Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sb.Append("--");Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(boundary);Di2015NewLine            sb.AppendLine();Di2015NewLine            foreach (string key in _headers.AllKeys) {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(key);Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(": ");Di2015NewLine                sb.AppendLine(_headers[key]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            sb.AppendLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Header = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(sb.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return Header.Length + Data.Length + 2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Stream Data { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9144526Di2015UniqueSeparator// Initialize the collection of strings to be matched against here.Di2015NewLinestring[] stringSequences = new string[] { "yes", "no", "hello" };Di2015NewLineint maxLength = stringSequences.Max(s => s.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The buffer to hold the sequence of the last N characters.Di2015NewLinestring buffer = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinewhile (true)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Read the next character, and append it to the end of the buffer.Di2015NewLine    ConsoleKeyInfo next = Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    buffer += next.KeyChar;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If the buffer has exceeded our maximum length, Di2015NewLine    // trim characters from its start.Di2015NewLine    if (buffer.Length > maxLength)Di2015NewLine        buffer = buffer.Substring(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Check whether the last n characters of the bufferDi2015NewLine    // correspond to any of the sequences.Di2015NewLine    string match = stringSequences.FirstOrDefault(s => buffer.EndsWith(s));Di2015NewLine    if (match != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Match! Perform any custom processing here.Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Match: " + match);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9144526Di2015UniqueSeparator// Initialize the collection of key sequences to be matched against here.Di2015NewLineConsoleKey[][] keysSequences = new ConsoleKey[][]Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    new ConsoleKey[] { ConsoleKey.Y, ConsoleKey.E, ConsoleKey.S },Di2015NewLine    new ConsoleKey[] { ConsoleKey.N, ConsoleKey.O },Di2015NewLine    new ConsoleKey[] { ConsoleKey.H, ConsoleKey.E, ConsoleKey.L, ConsoleKey.L, ConsoleKey.O },Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineint maxLength = keysSequences.Max(ks => ks.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The buffer to hold the sequence of the last N keys.Di2015NewLineList<ConsoleKey> buffer = new List<ConsoleKey>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinewhile (true)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Read the next key, and append it to the end of the buffer.Di2015NewLine    ConsoleKeyInfo next = Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    buffer.Add(next.Key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If the buffer has exceeded our maximum length, Di2015NewLine    // trim keys from its start.Di2015NewLine    if (buffer.Count > maxLength)Di2015NewLine        buffer.RemoveAt(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Check whether the last n keys of the bufferDi2015NewLine    // correspond to any of the sequences.Di2015NewLine    ConsoleKey[] match = keysSequences.FirstOrDefault(ks => Di2015NewLine        buffer.Skip(buffer.Count - ks.Length).SequenceEqual(ks));Di2015NewLine    if (match != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Match! Perform any custom processing here.Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Match: " + Di2015NewLine            string.Concat(match.Select(k => k.ToString()).ToArray()));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9145754Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid int SQLQueryWith Implicit Date() { Di2015NewLine    // Create a sql statement with a parameter (@ImplicitYear) Di2015NewLine    string sql = @"SELECT rank = Count(*) Di2015NewLine                   FROM   table Di2015NewLine                   WHERE  table.date >= @ImplicitYear"; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Create a sql connection Di2015NewLine// Always use the using statement for this Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing (var connection = new SqlConnection(connectionString)) { Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a sql command Di2015NewLine    // Always use the using statement for this Di2015NewLine    using (var command = new SqlCommand(sql, connection)) { Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Pass the dateinput argument to the command, and let Di2015NewLine        // the .NET Framework handle the conversion properly! Di2015NewLine        command.Parameters.Add(new SqlCommand("ImplicitYear", DateTime.Now.Year())); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // No need for calling .Close() or .Dispose() - the using Di2015NewLine        // statements handle that for us Di2015NewLine        return (int)command.ExecuteScalar(); Di2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLine

9145904Di2015UniqueSeparatorenum NumberKind {Di2015NewLine  Int32,Di2015NewLine  Decimal,Di2015NewLine  HexaDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring ConvertNumber(NumberKind inputKind, string inputValue, NumberKind outputKind) {Di2015NewLine  IConvertible intermediate;Di2015NewLine  switch (inputKind) {Di2015NewLine  case NumberKind.Int32:Di2015NewLine    intermediate = Int32.Parse(inputValue, NumberStyles.Integer, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine    break;Di2015NewLine  case NumberKind.Decimal:Di2015NewLine    intermediate = Decimal.Parse(inputValue, NumberStyles.Number, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine    break;Di2015NewLine  case NumberKind.Hexa:Di2015NewLine    intermediate = Int32.Parse(inputValue, NumberStyles.HexNumber, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine    break;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  switch (outputKind) {Di2015NewLine  case NumberKind.Int32:Di2015NewLine    return intermediate.ToInt32().ToString("D", CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine  case NumberKind.Decimal:Di2015NewLine    return intermediate.ToDecimal().ToString("G", CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine  case NumberKind.Hexa:Di2015NewLine    return intermediate.ToInt32().ToString("X", CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9156463Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> DepthFirstTraversal<T>(Di2015NewLine    T root, Di2015NewLine    Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> children)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var set = new HashSet<T>();Di2015NewLine    var stack = new Stack<T>();Di2015NewLine    stack.Push(root);Di2015NewLine    while(stack.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T current = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine        if (set.Contains(current)) continue;Di2015NewLine        yield return current;Di2015NewLine        set.Add(current);Di2015NewLine        foreach(var child in children(current))Di2015NewLine            stack.Push(child);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9159594Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunc<int, string> ageGroup = age => string.Format("Age {0}-{1}", (age / 5) * 5, ((age / 5) * 5) + 4);Di2015NewLinevar blub = from row in table.AsEnumerable()Di2015NewLine           where row.IsActive == 1Di2015NewLine           group row by ageGroup(row.age)Di2015NewLine           into groupedDi2015NewLine           from g in groupedDi2015NewLine           let menCount = g.Aggregate(0, (sum, r) => sum + r.men)Di2015NewLine           let womenCount = g.Aggregate(0, (sum, r) => sum + r.women)Di2015NewLine           let totalCount = menCount + womenCountDi2015NewLine           select new { AgeGroup = g.Key, Men = menCount, Women = womenCount, Total = totalCount}Di2015NewLine

9162610Di2015UniqueSeparator    protected override IController GetControllerInstance(RequestContext requestContext, Type controllerType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IController controller = null;Di2015NewLine        if (controllerType == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new HttpException(404, String.Format("The controller for path '{0}' could not be found or it does not implement IController.", requestContext.HttpContext.Request.Path));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!typeof(IController).IsAssignableFrom(controllerType))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException(String.Format("Type requested is not a controller: {0}", controllerType.Name), "controllerType");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (this.container.IsRegistered(controllerType))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                controller = this.container.Resolve(controllerType) as IController;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                controller = base.GetControllerInstance(requestContext, controllerType);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException(String.Format("Error resolving controller {0}", controllerType.Name, ex));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return controller;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9163002Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<BufferWrapper> getBytes(Stream stream)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<int> bufferSizes = new List<int>() { 8192, 65536, 220160, 1048576 };Di2015NewLine    int count = 0;Di2015NewLine    int bufferSizePostion = 0;Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[bufferSizes[0]];Di2015NewLine    bool done = false;Di2015NewLine    while (!done)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BufferWrapper nextResult = new BufferWrapper();Di2015NewLine        nextResult.bytesRead = stream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        nextResult.buffer = buffer;Di2015NewLine        done = nextResult.bytesRead == 0;Di2015NewLine        if (!done)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return nextResult;Di2015NewLine            count++;Di2015NewLine            if (count > 10 && bufferSizePostion < bufferSizes.Count)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                count = 0;Di2015NewLine                bufferSizePostion++;Di2015NewLine                buffer = new byte[bufferSizes[bufferSizePostion]];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class BufferWrapperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public byte[] buffer { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int bytesRead { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9164354Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Scramble<T>(T[] array, int key)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var random = new Random(key);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = array.Length; i > 1; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Swap(array, random.Next(i), i - 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Unscramble<T>(T[] array, int key)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var random = new Random(key);Di2015NewLine    var swaps = new List<int>(array.Length);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = array.Length; i > 1; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       swaps.Add(random.Next(i));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    swaps.Reverse();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0 ; i < swaps.Count; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Swap(array, swaps[i], i + 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Swap<T>(T[] array, int i1, int i2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T tmp = array[i2];Di2015NewLine    array[i2] = array[i1];Di2015NewLine    array[i1] = tmp;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9166802Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static float DirectionalAngle(Vector3 from, Vector3 to, Vector3 up)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // project the vectors on the plane with up as a normalDi2015NewLine    Vector3 f = Vector3.Exclude(up, from);Di2015NewLine    Vector3 t = Vector3.Exclude(up, to);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // rotate the vectors into y-up coordinatesDi2015NewLine    Quaternion toZ = Quaternion.FromToRotation(up, Vector3.up);Di2015NewLine    f = toZ * f;Di2015NewLine    t = toZ * t;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // calculate the quaternion in between f and t.Di2015NewLine    Quaternion fromTo = Quaternion.FromToRotation(f,t);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // return the eulers.Di2015NewLine    return fromTo.eulerAngles.y;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9180054Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<string> inputValues = new List<string>() { "ABC", "G", "WY" };Di2015NewLine    List<string> results = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int permutations = (int)Math.Pow(2.0, (double)inputValues.Count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < permutations; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int mask = 1;Di2015NewLine        Stack<string> lineValues = new Stack<string>();Di2015NewLine        for (int j = inputValues.Count-1; j >= 0; j--, mask <<= 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ((i & mask) == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lineValues.Push(inputValues[j]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lineValues.Push("ALL");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        results.Add(string.Join("_", lineValues.ToArray())); //ToArray can go away in 4.0(?) I've been told.  I'm still on 3.5Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (string s in results)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(s);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Press any key to exit...");Di2015NewLine    Console.ReadKey(true);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9181423Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void WaitForConnectionCallBack(IAsyncResult result)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PipeServer.EndWaitForConnection(result);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// ...Di2015NewLine        /// Some arbitrary codeDi2015NewLine        /// ...Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catchDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If the pipe is closed before a client ever connects, EndWaitForConnection() will throw an exception.Di2015NewLine        // If we are in here that is probably the case so just return.Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void Start()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    NamedPipeServerStream tempPipe = new NamedPipeServerStream("TempPipe", PipeDirection.In,Di2015NewLine                254, PipeTransmissionMode.Message, PipeOptions.Asynchronous);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If nothing ever connects, the callback will never be called.Di2015NewLine    tempPipe.BeginWaitForConnection(new AsyncCallback(WaitForConnectionCallBack), this);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// ...Di2015NewLine    /// arbitrary codeDi2015NewLine    /// ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// EndWaitForConnection() was not the right answer here, as it would just wait indefinatelyDi2015NewLine    /// if you called it.  As Hans Passant mention, its meant to be used in the callback. whichDi2015NewLine    /// it now is.  Instead, we are going to close the pipe.  This will trigger the callback to getDi2015NewLine    /// called.  However, the EndWaitForConnection() that will excecute in the callback will failDi2015NewLine    /// with an exception since the pipe is closed by time it gets invoked, thus you must capture itDi2015NewLine    /// with a try/catchDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tempPipe.Close();   // <--- effectively closes our pipe and gets our BeginWaitForConnection()Di2015NewLine                        // moving, even though any future operations on the pipe will fail.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

     case JTokenType.String:Di2015NewLine        case JTokenType.Integer:Di2015NewLine        case JTokenType.Float:Di2015NewLine        case JTokenType.Date:Di2015NewLine        case }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return data;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9184568Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] WriteObject<T>(T thingToSave)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Serializing an instance of the object.");Di2015NewLine    byte[] bytes;Di2015NewLine    using(var stream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var serializer = new DataContractSerializer(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine        serializer.WriteObject(stream, thingToSave);Di2015NewLine        bytes = new byte[stream.Length];Di2015NewLine        stream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine        stream.Read(bytes, 0, (int)stream.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return bytes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static T ReadObject<T>(byte[] data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Deserializing an instance of the object.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    T deserializedThing = default(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using(var stream = new MemoryStream(data))Di2015NewLine    using(var reader = XmlDictionaryReader.CreateTextReader(stream, new XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas()))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var serializer = new DataContractSerializer(typeof(T));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Deserialize the data and read it from the instance.Di2015NewLine        deserializedThing = (T)serializer.ReadObject(reader, true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return deserializedThing;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9186591Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Mailbox[] ListMailboxes(string reference, string pattern) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IdlePause();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var x = new List<Mailbox>();Di2015NewLine    string command = GetTag() + "LIST " + reference.QuoteString() + " " + pattern.QuoteString();Di2015NewLine    string reg = "\\\\* LIST \\\\(([^\\\\)]*)\\\\) \\\\\\"([^\\\\\\"]+)\\\\\\" \\\\\\"?([^\\\\\\"]+)\\\\\\"?";Di2015NewLine    string response = SendCommandGetResponse(command);Di2015NewLine    Match m = Regex.Match(response, reg);Di2015NewLine    while (m.Groups.Count > 1) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Mailbox mailbox = new Mailbox(m.Groups[3].ToString());Di2015NewLine        x.Add(mailbox);Di2015NewLine        response = GetResponse();Di2015NewLine        m = Regex.Match(response, reg);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    IdleResume();Di2015NewLine    return x.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9189636Di2015UniqueSeparator// set up connection stringDi2015NewLinestring connectionString = "server=.;database=test;integrated Security=SSPI;";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// define a CTE (Common Table Expression) to recursively build your hierarchicalDi2015NewLine// structure into a flat list and order it according to its "sequence" (root first)Di2015NewLinestring cteStatement =Di2015NewLine            @";WITH Hierarchy ASDi2015NewLine              (Di2015NewLine                 SELECTDi2015NewLine                    ID,  ParentID = CAST(NULL AS INT),Di2015NewLine                    Name, HierLevel = 1Di2015NewLine                 FROMDi2015NewLine                    dbo.HierarchyTest   -- replace with your table name!Di2015NewLine                 WHEREDi2015NewLine                    ParentID IS NULLDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                 UNION ALLDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                 SELECTDi2015NewLine                    ht.ID, ht.ParentID, ht.Name, h1.HierLevel + 1Di2015NewLine                 FROMDi2015NewLine                    dbo.HierarchyTest ht   -- replace with your table name!Di2015NewLine                 INNER JOIN Di2015NewLine                    Hierarchy h1 ON ht.ParentID = h1.IDDi2015NewLine              )Di2015NewLine              SELECT Id, ParentId, NameDi2015NewLine              FROM HierarchyDi2015NewLine              ORDER BY HierLevel, Id";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// set up list of "Unit" objectsDi2015NewLineList<Unit> units = new List<Unit>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// create connection and command to query             Di2015NewLineusing(SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection(connectionString))Di2015NewLineusing(SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(cteStatement, conn))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    conn.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // use SqlDataReader to iterate over resultsDi2015NewLine    using(SqlDataReader rdr = cmd.ExecuteReader())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while(rdr.Read())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // get the info from the reader into the "Unit" objectDi2015NewLine            Unit thisUnit = new Unit();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            thisUnit.Id = rdr.GetInt32(0);Di2015NewLine            thisUnit.Name = rdr.GetString(2);Di2015NewLine            thisUnit.Children = new List<Unit>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // check if we have a parentDi2015NewLine            if(!rdr.IsDBNull(1))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // get ParentIdDi2015NewLine                int parentId = rdr.GetInt32(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // find parent in list of units already loadedDi2015NewLine                Unit parent = units.FirstOrDefault(u => u.Id == parentId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // if parent found - set this unit's parent to that objectDi2015NewLine                if(parent != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    thisUnit.Parent = parent;Di2015NewLine                    parent.Children.Add(thisUnit);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                units.Add(thisUnit);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    conn.Close();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9190959Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string Prepare(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder output = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    char[] chars = input.ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < chars.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (chars[i] == '-')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (i > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                output.Append(chars[i - 1]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (++i < chars.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                output.Append(chars[i])Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return output.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9190959Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string[] Prepare(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<string> output = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    char[] chars = input.ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < chars.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (chars[i] == '-')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string o = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            if (i > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                o += chars[i - 1];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (++i < chars.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                o += chars[i]Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            output.Add(o); Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return output.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9199169Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class MyEnumerableExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<TFirst> NotReallyZip<TFirst, TSecond>(this IEnumerable<TFirst> first, IEnumerable<TSecond> second, Func<TFirst, TSecond, TFirst> resultSelector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var firstEnumerator = first.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine        using (var secondEnumerator = second.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (secondEnumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (firstEnumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    do yield return resultSelector(firstEnumerator.Current, secondEnumerator.Current);Di2015NewLine                    while (firstEnumerator.MoveNext() && secondEnumerator.MoveNext());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (firstEnumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                    yield return firstEnumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

       if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(str))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentException("Provider type name is invalid");Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine                throw new ConfigurationErrorsException(exception.Message,Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine            return base2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void InstantiateProviders(ProviderSettingsCollection providerSettings, ProviderCollection providers, Type type)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (ProviderSettings settings in providerSettings)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine 9204080Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar version = [incrementally generated number here];Di2015NewLinevar cacheEnabled; //will contain the result of our checkDi2015NewLinevar cloneCallback;//function which will compare versions from two javascript filesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction isCacheEnabled(){Di2015NewLine   if(!window.cloneCallback){Di2015NewLine       var currentVersion = version;//cache current version of the fileDi2015NewLine       // request the same cachedetect.js by adding <script> tag dynamically to <header>Di2015NewLine       var head = document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0];Di2015NewLine       var script = document.createElement('script');Di2015NewLine       script.type = 'text/javascript';Di2015NewLine       script.src = "cachedetect.js";Di2015NewLine       // newly loaded cachedetect.js will execute the same function isCacheEnabled, so we need to prevent it from loading the script for third time by checking for cloneCallback existence       Di2015NewLine       cloneCallback = function(){Di2015NewLine           // once file will be loaded, version variable will contain different from currentVersion value in case when cache is disabled Di2015NewLine           window.cacheEnabled = currentVersion == window.version;        Di2015NewLine       };      Di2015NewLine       head.appendChild(script);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }  else {Di2015NewLine        window.cloneCallback();Di2015NewLine    }   Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineisCacheEnabled();Di2015NewLine

9209908Di2015UniqueSeparatorint _alreadyBeingExecutedCounter;Di2015NewLinevar lockObject = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (Monitor.TryEnter(lockObject))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // you'll only end up here if you got the lock when you tried to get it - otherwise you'll never execute this code.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // do some stuffDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //call exit to release the lockDi2015NewLine    Monitor.Exit(lockObject);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // didn't get the lock - someone else was executing the code above - so I don't need to do any work!Di2015NewLine   Interlocked.Increment(ref _alreadyBeingExecutedCounter);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9212826Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var myDemo = new Demo();Di2015NewLine        myDemo.Size = 1000000;Di2015NewLine        myDemo.Value = 15.7m;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("ToSizeInKb: " + myDemo.ToString(DemoConversionType.ToSizeInKb));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("ToValue: " + myDemo.ToString(DemoConversionType.ToValue));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Environment.NewLine + "Press enter to exit.");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Defines different ways to convert the Demo class objects into strings.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    enum DemoConversionTypeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ToSizeInKb,Di2015NewLine        ToValueDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class DemoDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int? Size { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public decimal Value { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Override the default ToString method and pass a "DemoConversionType"Di2015NewLine        /// that defaults how the object should be converted to a string.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name='convType'></param>Di2015NewLine        public string ToString(DemoConversionType convType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (convType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Return the Size in KbDi2015NewLine                case DemoConversionType.ToSizeInKb:Di2015NewLine                    return Size.GetValueOrDefault() / 1000 + "Kb";Di2015NewLine                // Return the Value to 2 decimal places.Di2015NewLine                case DemoConversionType.ToValue:Di2015NewLine                    return string.Format("{0:N2}", Value);Di2015NewLine                // Bad conv type, default back to the base ToString() method.Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    return base.ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9214068Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string SomeImportantField { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string SomeOtherField { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string AnotherField { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic IList<MyClass> GetObjectsFromStream(Stream stream)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var cb = new DelimitedClassBuilder("temp", ",") { IgnoreFirstLines = 1, IgnoreEmptyLines = true, Delimiter = "," };Di2015NewLine    var sr = new StreamReader(stream);Di2015NewLine    var headerArray = sr.ReadLine().Split(',');Di2015NewLine    foreach (var header in headerArray)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var fieldName = header.Replace("\\"", "").Replace(" ", "");Di2015NewLine        cb.AddField(fieldName, typeof(string));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var engine = new FileHelperEngine(cb.CreateRecordClass());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<MyClass> objects = new List<MyClass>();Di2015NewLine    DataTable dt = engine.ReadStreamAsDT(sr);Di2015NewLine    foreach (DataRow row in dt.Rows) // Loop over the rows.Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MyClass myClass = new MyClass();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < row.ItemArray.Length; i++) // Loop over the items.Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (headerArray[i] == "ImportantField")Di2015NewLine                myClass.SomeImportantField = row.ItemArray[i].ToString();Di2015NewLine            if (headerArray[i] == "OtherField")Di2015NewLine                myClass.SomeOtherField = row.ItemArray[i].ToString();Di2015NewLine            if (headerArray[i] == "AnotherField")Di2015NewLine                myClass.AnotherField = row.ItemArray[i].ToString();Di2015NewLine            objects.Add(myClass);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return objects;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9218702Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool isElementVisible(WebBrowser web, string elementID)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var element = web.Document.All[elementID];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (element == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException(elementID + " did not return an object from the webbrowser");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Calculate the offset of the element, all the way up through the parent nodesDi2015NewLine    var parent = element.OffsetParent;Di2015NewLine    int xoff = element.OffsetRectangle.X;Di2015NewLine    int yoff = element.OffsetRectangle.Y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (parent != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        xoff += parent.OffsetRectangle.X;Di2015NewLine        yoff += parent.OffsetRectangle.Y;Di2015NewLine        parent = parent.OffsetParent;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get the scrollbar offsetsDi2015NewLine    int scrollBarYPosition = web.Document.GetElementsByTagName("HTML")[0].ScrollTop;Di2015NewLine    int scrollBarXPosition = web.Document.GetElementsByTagName("HTML")[0].ScrollLeft;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Calculate the visible page spaceDi2015NewLine    Rectangle visibleWindow = new Rectangle(scrollBarXPosition, scrollBarYPosition, web.Width, web.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Calculate the visible area of the elementDi2015NewLine    Rectangle elementWindow = new Rectangle(xoff,yoff,element.ClientRectangle.Width, element.ClientRectangle.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (visibleWindow.IntersectsWith(elementWindow))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9221238Di2015UniqueSeparatorRegisterRoutes
9221238Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void RegisterRoutes()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // `TypeHelper.GetTypes().FilterTypes<T>` will find all of the types in theDi2015NewLine    // current AppDomain that:Di2015NewLine    // - Implement T if T is an interfaceDi2015NewLine    // - Are decorated with T if T is an attributeDi2015NewLine    // - Are children of T if T is anything elseDi2015NewLine    foreach (var type in TypeHelper.GetTypes()Di2015NewLine                                   .FilterTypes<ServiceRouteAttribute>())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // routeAttrs should never be null or empty because only types decoratedDi2015NewLine        // with `ServiceRouteAttribute` should ever get here.Di2015NewLine        // `GetAttribute<T>` is my extension method for `MemberInfo` which returns allDi2015NewLine        // decorations of `type` that are T or children of TDi2015NewLine        var routeAttrs = type.GetAttributes<ServiceRouteAttribute>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var routeAttr in routeAttrs)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Some dupe and error checkingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var routePrefix = routeAttr.RoutePrefix;Di2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(routePrefix))Di2015NewLine                routePrefix = type.Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            RouteTable.Routes.Add(new ServiceRoute(routePrefix, Di2015NewLine                                                   routeAttr.ServiceFactory,Di2015NewLine                                                   type));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9221904Di2015UniqueSeparatorXmlElement
9221904Di2015UniqueSeparatorposition()
9221904Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class XmlElementExtension
9221904Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static string GetXPath_UsingPreviousSiblings(this XmlElement element)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string path = "/" + element.Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        XmlElement parentElement = element.ParentNode as XmlElement;Di2015NewLine        if (parentElement != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Gets the position within the parent element, based on previous siblings of the same name.Di2015NewLine            // However, this position is irrelevant if the element is unique under its parent:Di2015NewLine            XPathNavigator navigator = parentElement.CreateNavigator();Di2015NewLine            int count = Convert.ToInt32(navigator.Evaluate("count(" + element.Name + ")"));Di2015NewLine            if (count > 1) // There's more than 1 element with the same nameDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int position = 1;Di2015NewLine                XmlElement previousSibling = element.PreviousSibling as XmlElement;Di2015NewLine                while (previousSibling != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (previousSibling.Name == element.Name)Di2015NewLine                        position++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    previousSibling = previousSibling.PreviousSibling as XmlElement;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                path = path + "[" + position + "]";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Climbing up to the parent elements:Di2015NewLine            path = parentElement.GetXPath_UsingPreviousSiblings() + path;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return path;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
9221904Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static string GetXPath_SequentialIteration(this XmlElement element)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string path = "/" + element.Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        XmlElement parentElement = element.ParentNode as XmlElement;Di2015NewLine        if (parentElement != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Gets the position within the parent element.Di2015NewLine            // However, this position is irrelevant if the element is unique under its parent:Di2015NewLine            XmlNodeList siblings = parentElement.SelectNodes(element.Name);Di2015NewLine            if (siblings != null && siblings.Count > 1) // There's more than 1 element with the same nameDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int position = 1;Di2015NewLine                foreach (XmlElement sibling in siblings)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (sibling == element)Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    position++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                path = path + "[" + position + "]";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Climbing up to the parent elements:Di2015NewLine            path = parentElement.GetXPath_SequentialIteration() + path;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return path;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
9221904Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static void Measure(string functionName, int iterations, Action implementation)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stopwatch watch = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine        watch.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < iterations; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            implementation();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0}: {1}ms", functionName, watch.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine        doc.Load(@"location of some large and complex XML file");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string referenceXPath = "/vps/vendorProductSets/vendorProductSet/product[100]/prodName/locName";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Measure("UsingPreviousSiblings", 10000,Di2015NewLine                () =>Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        XmlElement target = doc.SelectSingleNode(referenceXPath) as XmlElement;Di2015NewLine                        Debug.Assert(referenceXPath == target.GetXPath_UsingPreviousSiblings());Di2015NewLine                    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Measure("SequentialIteration", 10000,Di2015NewLine                () =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    XmlElement target = doc.SelectSingleNode(referenceXPath) as XmlElement;Di2015NewLine                    Debug.Assert(referenceXPath == target.GetXPath_SequentialIteration());Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9223552Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static float Wrap(float value, float lower, float upper)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    uncheckedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (lower >= upper)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArithmeticException("rotary bounds out of negative or zero size");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        float distance = upper - lower;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        float times = (float)Math.Floor((value - lower) / distance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return value - (times * distance);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9225739Di2015UniqueSeparator       private string ConvertToTitleCase(string input, string ignore) {Di2015NewLine            var lcSB = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            var lcStart = 0;Di2015NewLine            while (lcStart < input.Length) {Di2015NewLine                var lcNext = input.IndexOf(ignore, lcStart);Di2015NewLine                if (lcNext < 0)Di2015NewLine                    lcNext = input.Length;Di2015NewLine                lcSB.Append(input.Substring(lcStart, lcNext - lcStart).ToUpper());Di2015NewLine                if (lcNext < input.Length)Di2015NewLine                    lcSB.Append(ignore);Di2015NewLine                lcStart = lcNext + ignore.Length;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return lcSB.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

9230915Di2015UniqueSeparatorinterface IPush<in T> { void Push(T item); }Di2015NewLineinterface IPop<out T> { T Pop(); }Di2015NewLineclass Stack<T> : IPush<T>, IPop<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private class LinkDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public T Item { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public Link Next { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public Link(T item, Link next) { this.Item = item; this.Next = next; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Link head;Di2015NewLine    public Stack() { this.head = null; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Push(T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.head = new Link(item, this.head);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T Pop()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.head == null) throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLine        T value = this.head.Item;Di2015NewLine        this.head = this.head.Next;Di2015NewLine        return value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9234176Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Specialized;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class PathHelpersDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// this method can accept an app-relative path or an absolute path for contentPathDi2015NewLinepublic static string GenerateClientUrl(HttpContextBase httpContext, string contentPath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(contentPath))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return contentPath;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // many of the methods we call internally can't handle query strings properly, so just strip it out forDi2015NewLine    // the time beingDi2015NewLine    string query;Di2015NewLine    contentPath = StripQuery(contentPath, out query);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return GenerateClientUrlInternal(httpContext, contentPath) + query;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string GenerateClientUrlInternal(HttpContextBase httpContext, string contentPath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(contentPath))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return contentPath;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // can't call VirtualPathUtility.IsAppRelative since it throws on some inputsDi2015NewLine    bool isAppRelative = contentPath[0] == '~';Di2015NewLine    if (isAppRelative)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string absoluteContentPath = VirtualPathUtility.ToAbsolute(contentPath, httpContext.Request.ApplicationPath);Di2015NewLine        string modifiedAbsoluteContentPath = httpContext.Response.ApplyAppPathModifier(absoluteContentPath);Di2015NewLine        return GenerateClientUrlInternal(httpContext, modifiedAbsoluteContentPath);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string relativeUrlToDestination = MakeRelative(httpContext.Request.Path, contentPath);Di2015NewLine    string absoluteUrlToDestination = MakeAbsolute(httpContext.Request.RawUrl, relativeUrlToDestination);Di2015NewLine    return absoluteUrlToDestination;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string MakeAbsolute(string basePath, string relativePath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The Combine() method can't handle query strings on the base path, so we trim it off.Di2015NewLine    string query;Di2015NewLine    basePath = StripQuery(basePath, out query);Di2015NewLine    return VirtualPathUtility.Combine(basePath, relativePath);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string MakeRelative(string fromPath, string toPath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string relativeUrl = VirtualPathUtility.MakeRelative(fromPath, toPath);Di2015NewLine    if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(relativeUrl) || relativeUrl[0] == '?')Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Sometimes VirtualPathUtility.MakeRelative() will return an empty string when it meant to return '.',Di2015NewLine        // but links to {empty string} are browser dependent. We replace it with an explicit path to forceDi2015NewLine        // consistency across browsers.Di2015NewLine        relativeUrl = "./" + relativeUrl;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return relativeUrl;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string StripQuery(string path, out string query)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int queryIndex = path.IndexOf('?');Di2015NewLine    if (queryIndex >= 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        query = path.Substring(queryIndex);Di2015NewLine        return path.Substring(0, queryIndex);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        query = null;Di2015NewLine        return path;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9234176Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string GenerateUrl(string routeName, string actionName, string controllerName, RouteCollection routeCollection, RequestContext requestContext)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    RouteValueDictionary mergedRouteValues = MergeRouteValues(actionName, controllerName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    VirtualPathData vpd = routeCollection.GetVirtualPathForArea(requestContext, routeName, mergedRouteValues);Di2015NewLine    if (vpd == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string modifiedUrl = PathHelpers.GenerateClientUrl(requestContext.HttpContext, vpd.VirtualPath);Di2015NewLine    return modifiedUrl;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static RouteValueDictionary MergeRouteValues(string actionName, string controllerName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Create a new dictionary containing implicit and auto-generated valuesDi2015NewLine    RouteValueDictionary mergedRouteValues = new RouteValueDictionary();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Merge explicit parameters when not nullDi2015NewLine    if (actionName != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        mergedRouteValues["action"] = actionName;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (controllerName != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        mergedRouteValues["controller"] = controllerName;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return mergedRouteValues;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9234176Di2015UniqueSeparatorDictionary<string, List<string>> controllersAndActions = new Dictionary<string, List<string>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Get all the controllersDi2015NewLinevar controllers = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetTypes().Where(t => typeof(Controller).IsAssignableFrom(t));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (var controller in controllers)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<string> actions = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    //Get all methods without HttpPost and with return type action resultDi2015NewLine    var methods = controller.GetMethods().Where(m => typeof(ActionResult).IsAssignableFrom(m.ReturnType)).Where(a=>!a.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(HttpPostAttribute),true).Any());Di2015NewLine    methods.ToList().ForEach(a => {Di2015NewLine        actions.Add(a.Name);Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine    var controllerName = controller.Name;Di2015NewLine    if (controllerName.EndsWith("Controller"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var nameLength = controllerName.Length - "Controller".Length;Di2015NewLine        controllerName = controllerName.Substring(0, nameLength);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    controllersAndActions.Add(controllerName, actions);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineList<string> allowedRoutes = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar routeNames = RouteTable.Routes.Where(o=>o.GetRouteData(this.HttpContext)!=null).Select(r=>r.GetRouteData(this.HttpContext).DataTokens["RouteName"].ToString());Di2015NewLineforeach (var cName in controllersAndActions)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (var aName in cName.Value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in routeNames)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            allowedRoutes.Add(GenerateUrl(item, aName, cName.Key, RouteTable.Routes, this.Request.RequestContext));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9234617Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Concurrent;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ExampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class TaskScheduler : IDisposableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public const int IDLE_DELAY = 100;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private ConcurrentQueue<Func<bool>> PendingTasks;Di2015NewLine        private Thread ExecuterThread;Di2015NewLine        private volatile bool _IsDisposed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool IsDisposedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _IsDisposed; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void EnqueueTask(Func<bool> task)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PendingTasks.Enqueue(task);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Start()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CheckDisposed();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (ExecuterThread != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("The task scheduler is alreader running.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ExecuterThread = new Thread(Run);Di2015NewLine            ExecuterThread.IsBackground = true;Di2015NewLine            ExecuterThread.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void CheckDisposed()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_IsDisposed)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ObjectDisposedException("TaskScheduler");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Run()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (!_IsDisposed)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (PendingTasks.IsEmpty)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Thread.Sleep(IDLE_DELAY);Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Func<bool> task;Di2015NewLine                while (!PendingTasks.TryDequeue(out task))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Thread.Sleep(0);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!task.Invoke())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    PendingTasks.Enqueue(task);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CheckDisposed();Di2015NewLine            _IsDisposed = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9237404Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DataTable DataTableJoiner(DataTable dt1, DataTable dt2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DataTable targetTable = dt1.Clone();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var dt2Query = dt2.Columns.OfType<DataColumn>().Select(dc =>Di2015NewLine        new DataColumn(dc.ColumnName, dc.DataType, dc.Expression, Di2015NewLine            dc.ColumnMapping));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var dt2FilterQuery = from dc in dt2Query.AsEnumerable()Di2015NewLine                         where !targetTable.Columns.Contains(dc.ColumnName)Di2015NewLine                         select dc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var columnsToAdd = dt2FilterQuery.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    var columnsIndices = columnsToAdd.Select(dc => dt2.Columns.IndexOf(dc.ColumnName));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    targetTable.Columns.AddRange(columnsToAdd);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var rowData = from row1 in dt1.AsEnumerable()Di2015NewLine                      join row2 in dt2.AsEnumerable()Di2015NewLine                      on row1.Field<int>("Code") equals Di2015NewLine                         row2.Field<int>("Code")Di2015NewLine                      select row1.ItemArrayDi2015NewLine                          .Concat(row2.ItemArrayDi2015NewLine                          .Where((r2,idx) => Di2015NewLine                              columnsIndices.Contains(idx))).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (object[] values in rowData) targetTable.Rows.Add(values);Di2015NewLine    return targetTable;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9237856Di2015UniqueSeparator// Build the parameter to the where clause predicate and access AwesomePropertyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar regionParameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(Region), "region");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar awesomeProperty = Expression.Property(regionParameter, "AwesomeProperty");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Build the where clause predicate using the AwesomeProperty accessDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar predicate = Expression.Lambda<Func<Region, bool>>(awesomeProperty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Get the table, which serves as the base queryDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar table = dc.Regions.AsQueryable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Call the Where method using the predicate and the table as the base queryDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar whereCall = Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine    typeof(Queryable),Di2015NewLine    "Where",Di2015NewLine    new[] { table.ElementType },Di2015NewLine    table.Expression,Di2015NewLine    predicate);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Get an IQueryable<Region> which executes the where call on the tableDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar query = table.Provider.CreateQuery<Region>(whereCall);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar results = query.ToList();Di2015NewLine

This prevents the calling thread from blocking its execution while other threads process the request.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    SWP_ASYNCWINDOWPOS = 0x4000,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///     Prevents generation of the WM_SYNCPAINT message.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    SWP_DEFERERASE = 0x2000,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///     Draws a frame (defined in the window's class description) around the window.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    SWP_DRAWFRAME = 0x0020,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///     Applies new frame styles set using the SetWindowLong function. Sends a WM_NCCALCSIZE message to the window, even if the window's size is not being changed. If this flag is not specified, WM_NCCALCSIZE is sent only when the window's size is being changed.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    SWP_FRAMECHANGED = 0x0020,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///     Hides the window.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    SWP_HIDEWINDOW = 0x0080,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///     Does not activate the window. If this flag is not set, the window is activated and moved to the top of either the topmost or non-topmost group (depending on the setting of the hWndInsertAfter parameter).Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    SWP_NOACTIVATE = 0x0010,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///     Discards the entire contents of the client area. If this flag is not specified, the valid contents of the client area are saved and copied back into the client area after the window is sized or repositioned.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    SWP_NOCOPYBITS = 0x0100,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///     Retains the current position (ignores X and Y parameters).Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    SWP_NOMOVE = 0x0002,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///     Does not change the owner window's position in the Z order.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    SWP_NOOWNERZORDER = 0x0200,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///     Does not redraw changes. When this flag is set, the application must explicitly invalidate or redraw any parts of the window and parent window that need redrawing.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    SWP_NOREDRAW = 0x0008,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///     Same as the SWP_NOOWNERZORDER flag.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    SWP_NOREPOSITION = 0x0200,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///     Prevents the window from receiving the WM_WINDOWPOSCHANGING message.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    SWP_NOSENDCHANGING = 0x0400,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///     Retains the current size (ignores the cx and cy parameters).Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    SWP_NOSIZE = 0x0001,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///     Retains the current Z order (ignores the hWndInsertAfter parameter).Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    SWP_NOZORDER = 0x0004,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///     Displays the window.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    SWP_SHOWWINDOW = 0x0040,Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ReSharper restore InconsistentNamingDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine[return: MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.Bool)]Di2015NewLinestatic extern bool SetWindowPos(IntPtr hWnd, IntPtr hWndInsertAfter, int X, int Y, int cx, int cy, SetWindowPosFlags uFlags);Di2015NewLine

9246517Di2015UniqueSeparatordef sigDigits (n):Di2015NewLine    # Handle negative numbers.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if n < 0:Di2015NewLine        return sigDigits (-n)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    # 0..9 is one significant digit.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if n < 10:Di2015NewLine        return 1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    # Otherwise it's one plus the count in n/10 (truncated).Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return 1 + sigDigits (n / 10)Di2015NewLine
9246517Di2015UniqueSeparatordef sigDigits (n):Di2015NewLine    # Handle negative numbers.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if n < 0:Di2015NewLine        n = -nDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    # All numbers have at least one significant digit.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    digits = 1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    # Then we add one and divide by ten (truncated), until we get low enough.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while n > 9:Di2015NewLine        n = n / 10Di2015NewLine        digits = digits + 1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return digitsDi2015NewLine

9249961Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrivate Declare Function GetDC Lib "user32" (ByVal hwnd As Long) As LongDi2015NewLinePrivate Declare Function ReleaseDC Lib "user32" (ByVal hwnd As Long, ByVal hdc As Long) As LongDi2015NewLinePrivate Declare Function GetDeviceCaps Lib "gdi32" (ByVal hdc As Long, ByVal nIndex As Long) As LongDi2015NewLinePrivate Const LOGPIXELSX As Long = 88Di2015NewLinePrivate Const LOGPIXELSY As Long = 90Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSub CellTopLeftPixels(rng As Excel.Range)Di2015NewLineDim RibbonHeight As LongDi2015NewLineDim TotalTop As LongDi2015NewLineDim TotalLeft As LongDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineRibbonHeight = Application.CommandBars("Ribbon").HeightDi2015NewLineTotalTop = (RibbonHeight + GetFormulaBarAndHeadingsHeight + rng.Top) * PixelsPerPointYDi2015NewLineTotalLeft = rng.Left * PixelsPerPointXDi2015NewLineDebug.Print "Top: "; 9250023Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void fill(int xInitial, int yInitial, Color border, Color c) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var remaining = new Stack<Tuple<int, int>>();Di2015NewLine    remaining.Push(Tuple.Create(xInitial, yInitial));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (remaining.Any())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var next = remaining.Pop();Di2015NewLine        int x = next.Item1;Di2015NewLine        int y = next.Item2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Color PointedColor = GetPixel(panel1, x, y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (PointedColor.R != border.R && Di2015NewLine            PointedColor.G != border.G && Di2015NewLine            PointedColor.B != border.B &&Di2015NewLine            PointedColor.R != c.R && Di2015NewLine            PointedColor.G != c.G && Di2015NewLine            PointedColor.B != c.B &&Di2015NewLine            x >= 0 && Di2015NewLine            x < panel1.Size.Width && Di2015NewLine            y >= 0 && Di2015NewLine            y < panel1.Size.Height)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SetPixel(panel1, x, y, c);Di2015NewLine            remaining.Push(Tuple.Create(x - 1, y));Di2015NewLine            remaining.Push(Tuple.Create(x + 1, y));Di2015NewLine            remaining.Push(Tuple.Create(x, y - 1));Di2015NewLine            remaining.Push(Tuple.Create(x, y + 1));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9251984Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void SM_Dump_TruncStrings(ref List<myDataType> dump, int maxLength, bool addEllipses)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var sm in dump)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PropertyInfo[] infos = sm.GetType().GetProperties();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var info in infos)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (info.PropertyType == typeof(string))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var origValue = info.GetValue(sm, null) as string;Di2015NewLine                    if (origValue != null && origValue.Length > maxLength)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var newVal = origValue.Substring(0, maxLength);Di2015NewLine                        if (addEllipses)Di2015NewLine                            newVal += "...";Di2015NewLine                        info.SetValue(sm, newVal, null);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

GetMacFromIPv6Address(IPAddress ipv6Address)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ipv6Address.AddressFamily != Di2015NewLine address.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //set up target addressDi2015NewLine        MIB_IPNET_ROW2 row2 = new MIB_IPNET_ROW2();Di2015NewLine        row2.PhysicalAddress = new {Di2015NewLine                sock.Ipv6.sin6_addr.Byte = address.GetAddressBytes();Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine OperationalStatus.Up)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                row2.InterfaceIndex = (uint)clsNetworkStats.GetInterfaceIndex(Di2015NewLine                    netInterface.Description);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int result = ResolveIpNetEntry2(ref row2, ref 9255121Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass BusDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Subject<Command> commands;Di2015NewLine    Subject<Invocation> invocations;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // TODO: Instantiate meDi2015NewLine    List<Func<Command, bool>> handlerList; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Bus()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.commands = new Subject<Command>();Di2015NewLine        this.invocations = new Subject<Invocation>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        commands.SelectMany(x => {Di2015NewLine            // This FirstOrDefault() is just good ol' LINQDi2015NewLine            var passedHandler = Di2015NewLine                handlerList.FirstOrDefault(handler => handler(x) == true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return passedHandler != null ?Di2015NewLine                Observable.Return(new Invocation() { Command = x, Handled = true}) :Di2015NewLine                Observable.Throw<Invocation>(new Exception("Unhandled!"));Di2015NewLine        }).Multicast(invocations).Connect();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* ... snip ... */Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9255121Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunc<Command, IObservable<Invocation>>
9255121Di2015UniqueSeparatorTask<T>
9255121Di2015UniqueSeparatorcommands.SelectMany(x =>Di2015NewLine    handlerList.ToObservable()Di2015NewLine        .Select(h => Observable.Defer(() => h(x)))Di2015NewLine        .Concat()Di2015NewLine        .SkipWhile(x => x.Handled == false)Di2015NewLine        .TakeLast(1))Di2015NewLine    .Multicast(invocations).Connect();Di2015NewLine
9255121Di2015UniqueSeparatorIO<IO<Invocation>>

9259204Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ToEngV(this double d, int digits, bool round)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var lenght = Math.Truncate(d).ToString().Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (lenght > digits)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("...");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int decimals = digits - lenght;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (round)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Math.Round(d, decimals).ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int pow = (int)Math.Pow(10, decimals);Di2015NewLine        return (Math.Truncate(d * pow) / pow).ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
