9262201Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate InstalledPrinter PreferredPrinter { get; set; }Di2015NewLineprivate InstalledPrinter DefaultPrinter { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SetDefaultAndPreferredPrinters()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (UserSettings[SETTING_PREFERRED_PRINTER] == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            UserSettings[SETTING_PREFERRED_PRINTER] = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _preferredPrinterName = ((string)UserSettings[SETTING_PREFERRED_PRINTER]).Trim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<InstalledPrinter> installedPrinters = InstalledPrinter.GetList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DefaultPrinter = null;Di2015NewLine        PreferredPrinter = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (InstalledPrinter installedPrinter in installedPrinters)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (installedPrinter.IsDefault)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DefaultPrinter = installedPrinter;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (installedPrinter.Name.Equals(_preferredPrinterName, StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                PreferredPrinter = installedPrinter;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic enum PrinterStatus{Di2015NewLine  Other = 1,Di2015NewLine  Unknown,Di2015NewLine  Idle,Di2015NewLine  Printing,Di2015NewLine  Warmup,Di2015NewLine  Stopped,Di2015NewLine  Offline,Di2015NewLine  DegradedDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class InstalledPrinter{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static readonly ILog _s_logger =Di2015NewLine        LogManager.GetLogger(MethodBase.GetCurrentMethod().DeclaringType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic string DriverName { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic string Location { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic bool Network { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic string PortName { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic string ServerName { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic bool Shared { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic PrinterStatus Status { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic bool WorkOffline { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic bool IsDefault { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static List<InstalledPrinter> GetList()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    PrinterSettings ps = new PrinterSettings();Di2015NewLine        string sDefault = ps.PrinterName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string query = "Select * From Win32_Printer";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ManagementObjectSearcher searcher = new ManagementObjectSearcher(query);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ManagementObjectCollection results = searcher.Get();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<InstalledPrinter> list = new List<InstalledPrinter>(results.Count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (ManagementObject printManagementObject in results)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InstalledPrinter entry = new InstalledPrinter();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyInfo propertyInfo in typeof(InstalledPrinter).GetProperties()) {Di2015NewLine            object[] oparams = {1};Di2015NewLine            if (propertyInfo.Name != "IsDefault") {//The IsDefault property is worked out logically, the rest of the properties map identically to the columns of the WMI query results.Di2015NewLine                try {Di2015NewLine                    oparams[0] = ConvertValue(Di2015NewLine                        printManagementObject[propertyInfo.Name], propertyInfo.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine                    propertyInfo.GetSetMethod().Invoke(Di2015NewLine                        entry,Di2015NewLine                        oparams);Di2015NewLine                }catch(Exception e) {Di2015NewLine                    _s_logger.Error(string.Format("Failed to enumerate printer property Name:{0}, Type:{1}", propertyInfo.Name, propertyInfo.PropertyType));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _s_logger.Info(string.Format("Finished enumerating properties of printer: {0}", entry.Name == null ? "<Null>" : entry.Name));Di2015NewLine        if (sDefault.Equals(entry.Name, StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase)) {Di2015NewLine            entry.IsDefault = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        list.Add(entry);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return list;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static object ConvertValue(object value, Type type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (value != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object printerStatusRetval = null;Di2015NewLine        if (type == typeof(DateTime))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string time = value.ToString();Di2015NewLine            time = time.Substring(0, time.IndexOf("."));Di2015NewLine            return DateTime.ParseExact(time, "yyyyMMddHHmmss", null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (type == typeof(long))Di2015NewLine            return Convert.ToInt64(value);Di2015NewLine        else if (type == typeof(int))Di2015NewLine            return Convert.ToInt32(value);Di2015NewLine        else if (type == typeof(short))Di2015NewLine            return Convert.ToInt16(value);Di2015NewLine        else if (type == typeof(string))Di2015NewLine            return value.ToString();Di2015NewLine        else if (type == typeof(PrinterStatus))Di2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLine                printerStatusRetval = Enum.Parse(typeof (PrinterStatus), value.ToString());Di2015NewLine            } catch (Exception e) {Di2015NewLine                _s_logger.Error(string.Format("Failed to convert PrinterStatus with value {0}", value));Di2015NewLine                printerStatusRetval = value.ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine                return printerStatusRetval;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9262543Di2015UniqueSeparator  public class Robot : IDisposableDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    private static List<bool> UsedCounter = new List<bool>();Di2015NewLine    private static object Lock = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int ID { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Robot()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      lock (Lock)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        int nextIndex = GetAvailableIndex();Di2015NewLine        if (nextIndex == -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          nextIndex = UsedCounter.Count;Di2015NewLine          UsedCounter.Add(true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ID = nextIndex;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      lock (Lock)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        UsedCounter[ID] = false;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int GetAvailableIndex()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      for (int i = 0; i < UsedCounter.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        if (UsedCounter[i] == false)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          return i;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Nothing available.Di2015NewLine      return -1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9263086Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Control signals received by the console control handler.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic enum ConsoleControlEventType: intDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// A CTRL+C signal was received, either from keyboard input or from aDi2015NewLine    /// signal generated by the GenerateConsoleCtrlEvent function.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    CtrlC = 0,Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// A CTRL+BREAK signal was received, either from keyboard input or fromDi2015NewLine    /// a signal generated by GenerateConsoleCtrlEvent.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    CtrlBreak = 1,Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// A signal that the system sends to all processes attached to a consoleDi2015NewLine    /// when the user closes the console (either by clicking Close on the consoleDi2015NewLine    /// window's window menu, or by clicking the End Task button command fromDi2015NewLine    /// Task Manager).Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    CtrlClose = 2,Di2015NewLine    // 3 and 4 are reserved, per WinCon.hDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// A signal that the system sends to all console processes when a user is logging off. Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    CtrlLogoff = 5,Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// A signal that the system sends to all console processes when the system is shutting down. Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    CtrlShutdown = 6Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Control event handler delegate.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="CtrlType">Control event type.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>Return true to cancel the control event.  A return value of falseDi2015NewLine/// will terminate the application and send the event to the next controlDi2015NewLine/// handler.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic delegate bool ConsoleCtrlHandlerDelegate(ConsoleControlEventType CtrlType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[DllImport("kernel32.dll", SetLastError=true)]Di2015NewLinepublic static extern bool SetConsoleCtrlHandler(Di2015NewLineConsoleCtrlHandlerDelegate HandlerRoutine,Di2015NewLinebool Add);Di2015NewLine
9263086Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static bool ConsoleCtrlHandler(ConsoleControlEventType CtrlType)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    switch (CtrlType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case CtrlClose:Di2015NewLine            // handle it hereDi2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case CtrlBreak:Di2015NewLine            // handle it hereDi2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // returning false ends up calling the next handlerDi2015NewLine    // returning true will prevent further handlers from being called.Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9266355Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<T>.AddRange
9266355Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Caller()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // think of ss as a piece of paper that tells you where to find the list.Di2015NewLine    List<string> ss = new List<string> { "a", "b" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //passing by value: we take another piece of paper and copy the information on ss to that piece of paper; we pass that to the methodDi2015NewLine    DoNotReassign(ss);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //as this point, ss refers to the same list, that now contains { "a", "b", "c" }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //passing by reference: we pass the actual original piece of paper to the method.Di2015NewLine    Reassign(ref ss);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // now, ss refers to a different list, whose contents are { "x", "y", "z" }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinevoid DoNotReassign(List<string> strings)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    strings.Add("c");Di2015NewLine    strings = new List<string> { "x", "y", "z" }; // the caller will not see the change of referenceDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //in the piece of paper analogy, we have erased the piece of paper and written the locationDi2015NewLine    //of the new list on it.  Because this piece of paper is a copy of SS, the caller doesn't see the change.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinevoid Reassign(ref List<string> strings)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    strings.Add("d");Di2015NewLine    //at this point, strings contains { "a", "b", "c", "d" }, but we're about to throw that away:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    strings = new List<string> { "x", "y", "z" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //because strings is a reference to the caller's variable ss, the caller sees the reassignment to a new collectionDi2015NewLine    //in the piece of paper analogy, when we erase the paper and put the new object'sDi2015NewLine    //location on it, the caller sees that, because we are operating on the sameDi2015NewLine    //piece of paper ("ss") as the caller Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9266355Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring originalValue = "Hello, World!";Di2015NewLinestring workingCopy = originalValue;Di2015NewLineworkingCopy = workingCopy.Substring(0, workingCopy.Length - 1);Di2015NewLineworkingCopy = workingCopy + "?";Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(originalValue.Equals("Hello, World!"); // writes "True"Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(originalValue.Equals(workingCopy); // writes "False"Di2015NewLine

9267010Di2015UniqueSeparatorString lastText = "";Di2015NewLineprivate void textBox1_TextChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    String textBoxText = textBox1.Text.Replace("\\r\\n", "|");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (textBoxText.Length > lastText.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int charIndex = (textBoxText.Length - 1) % 15;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (charIndex >= 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            label1.Text = label1.Text.Insert(charIndex, textBoxText.Substring(textBoxText.Length - 1));Di2015NewLine            if (charIndex < textBoxText.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                label1.Text = label1.Text.Remove(charIndex + 1, 1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int charIndex = textBoxText.Length % 15;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (textBoxText.Length >= 15)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            label1.Text = label1.Text.Insert(charIndex, textBoxText[textBoxText.Length - 15].ToString());Di2015NewLine            if (charIndex < textBoxText.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                label1.Text = label1.Text.Remove(charIndex + 1, 1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            label1.Text = label1.Text.Remove(label1.Text.Length - 1, 1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    lastText = textBoxText;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9267174Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass XmlMergerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public XDocument Merge(XDocument first, XDocument second);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private XElement MergeElements(XElement first, XElement second);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private XAttribute MergeAttributes(XAttribute first, XAttribute second);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private XText MergeTexts(XText first, XText second);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9267174Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass XmlMergerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public XDocument Merge(XDocument first, XDocument second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new XDocument(MergeElements(first.Root, second.Root));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private XElement MergeElements(XElement first, XElement second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (first == null)Di2015NewLine            return second;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (second == null)Di2015NewLine            return first;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (first.Name != second.Name)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var firstId = (string)first.Attribute("id");Di2015NewLine        var secondId = (string)second.Attribute("id");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // different idsDi2015NewLine        if (firstId != secondId)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var result = new XElement(first.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var attributeNames = first.Attributes()Di2015NewLine            .Concat(second.Attributes())Di2015NewLine            .Select(a => a.Name)Di2015NewLine            .Distinct();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var attributeName in attributeNames)Di2015NewLine            result.Add(Di2015NewLine                MergeAttributes(Di2015NewLine                    first.Attribute(attributeName),Di2015NewLine                    second.Attribute(attributeName)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // text-only elementsDi2015NewLine        if (first.Nodes().OfType<XText>().Any() ||Di2015NewLine            second.Nodes().OfType<XText>().Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var firstText = first.Nodes().OfType<XText>().FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine            var secondText = second.Nodes().OfType<XText>().FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // we're not handling mixed elementsDi2015NewLine            if (first.Nodes().Any(n => n != firstText) ||Di2015NewLine                second.Nodes().Any(n => n != secondText))Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            result.Add(MergeTexts(firstText, secondText));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var elementNames = first.Elements()Di2015NewLine                .Concat(second.Elements())Di2015NewLine                .Select(e => e.Name)Di2015NewLine                .Distinct();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var elementName in elementNames)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var ids = first.Elements(elementName)Di2015NewLine                    .Concat(second.Elements(elementName))Di2015NewLine                    .Select(e => (string)e.Attribute("id"))Di2015NewLine                    .Distinct();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (var id in ids)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    XElement firstElement = first.Elements(elementName)Di2015NewLine                        .SingleOrDefault(e => (string)e.Attribute("id") == id);Di2015NewLine                    XElement secondElement = second.Elements(elementName)Di2015NewLine                        .SingleOrDefault(e => (string)e.Attribute("id") == id);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    result.Add(MergeElements(firstElement, secondElement));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private XAttribute MergeAttributes(XAttribute first, XAttribute second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (first == null)Di2015NewLine            return second;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (second == null)Di2015NewLine            return first;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (first.Name != second.Name)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (first.Value == second.Value)Di2015NewLine            return new XAttribute(first);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // can't merge attributes with different valuesDi2015NewLine        throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private XText MergeTexts(XText first, XText second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (first == null)Di2015NewLine            return second;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (second == null)Di2015NewLine            return first;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (first.Value == second.Value)Di2015NewLine            return new XText(first);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // can't merge texts with different valuesDi2015NewLine        throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9267201Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class HtmlExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IHtmlString CheckBoxesForEnumModel<TModel>(this HtmlHelper<TModel> htmlHelper)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!typeof(TModel).IsEnum)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("this helper can only be used with enums");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        foreach (Enum item in Enum.GetValues(typeof(TModel)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var ti = htmlHelper.ViewData.TemplateInfo;Di2015NewLine            var id = ti.GetFullHtmlFieldId(item.ToString());Di2015NewLine            var name = ti.GetFullHtmlFieldName(string.Empty);Di2015NewLine            var label = new TagBuilder("label");Di2015NewLine            label.Attributes["for"] = id;Di2015NewLine            label.SetInnerText(item.ToString());Di2015NewLine            sb.AppendLine(label.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var checkbox = new TagBuilder("input");Di2015NewLine            checkbox.Attributes["id"] = id;Di2015NewLine            checkbox.Attributes["name"] = name;Di2015NewLine            checkbox.Attributes["type"] = "checkbox";Di2015NewLine            checkbox.Attributes["value"] = item.ToString();Di2015NewLine            var model = htmlHelper.ViewData.Model as Enum;Di2015NewLine            if (model.HasFlag(item))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                checkbox.Attributes["checked"] = "checked";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            sb.AppendLine(checkbox.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new HtmlString(sb.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9267372Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> Flatten<T>(this T root, Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> getChildren)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T> rootSingleton = new T[] { root };Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T> children = getChildren(root);Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T> descendants = children.SelectMany(child => Flatten(child, getChildren));Di2015NewLine    return rootSingleton.Concat(descendants);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9269755Di2015UniqueSeparatorParse()
9269755Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<string>
9269755Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass CommandLineParserDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    char[]        cmd; // source bufferDi2015NewLine    StringBuilder buf; // output bufferDi2015NewLine    int           i; // current position within the source bufferDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CommandLineParser()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        cmd = null;Di2015NewLine        buf = null;Di2015NewLine        i = -1;Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<string> Parse( string commandLine )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        cmd = commandLine.ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine        buf = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        i = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while ( i < cmd.Length )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            char ch = cmd[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ( char.IsWhiteSpace( ch ) ) { throw new InvalidOperationException(); }Di2015NewLine            else if ( ch == '\\\\' ) { ParseEscapeSequence(); }Di2015NewLine            else if ( ch == '"' ) { ParseQuotedWord(); }Di2015NewLine            else { ParseBareWord(); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ( i >= cmd.Length || char.IsWhiteSpace( cmd[i] ) )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string arg = buf.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                yield return arg;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                buf.Length = 0;Di2015NewLine                ConsumeWhitespace();                    Di2015NewLine            }                Di2015NewLine        }            Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Parse a quoted wordDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private void ParseQuotedWord()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // scan over the lead-in quotation mark w/o adding it to the bufferDi2015NewLine        ++i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // scan the contents of the quoted word into the bufferDi2015NewLine        while ( i < cmd.Length && cmd[i] != '"' )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            char ch = cmd[i];Di2015NewLine            if ( ch == '\\\\' ) { ParseEscapeSequence(); }Di2015NewLine            else { buf.Append( ch ); ++i; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // scan over the lead-out quotation mark w/o adding it to the bufferDi2015NewLine        if ( i < cmd.Length )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ++i;Di2015NewLine        }            Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Parse a barewordDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private void ParseBareWord()Di2015NewLine    {            Di2015NewLine        while ( i < cmd.Length )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            char ch = cmd[i];Di2015NewLine            if ( char.IsWhiteSpace( ch ) ) break; // whitespace terminates a barewordDi2015NewLine            else if ( ch == '"' ) break; // lead-in quote starts a quoted wordDi2015NewLine            else if ( ch == '\\\\' ) break; // escape sequence terminates the barewordDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            buf.Append(ch); // otherwise, keep reading this word                Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ++i;                Di2015NewLine        }            Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Parse an escape sequence of one or more backslashes followed an an optional trailing quotation markDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private void ParseEscapeSequence()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine        // The rule is that:Di2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        // * An even number of backslashes followed by a quotation mark ('"') means thatDi2015NewLine        //   - the backslashes are escaped, so half that many get injected into the buffer, andDi2015NewLine        //   - the quotation mark is a lead-in/lead-out quotation mark that marks the start of a quoted wordDi2015NewLine        //     which does not get added to the buffer.Di2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        // * An odd number of backslashes followed by a quotation mark ('"') means thatDi2015NewLine        //   - the backslashes are escaped, so half that many get injected into the buffer, andDi2015NewLine        //   - the quotation mark is escaped. It's a literal quotation mark that also gets injected into the bufferDi2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        // * Any number of backslashes that aren't followed by a quotation mark ('"') have no special meaning:Di2015NewLine        //   all of them get added to the buffer as-sis.Di2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        // scan in the backslashesDi2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        int p = i; // start of the escape sequenceDi2015NewLine        while ( i < cmd.Length && cmd[i] == '\\\\' )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            buf.Append( '\\\\' );Di2015NewLine            ++i;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        // if the backslash sequence is followed by a quotation mark, it's an escape sequenceDi2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        if ( i < cmd.Length && cmd[i] == '"' )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int n         = ( i - p ); // find the number of backslashes seenDi2015NewLine            int quotient  = n >> 1; // n divide 2 ( 5 div 2 = 2 , 6 div 2 = 3 )Di2015NewLine            int remainder = n & 1; // n modulo 2 ( 5 mod 2 = 1 , 6 mod 2 = 0 )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            buf.Length -= ( quotient + remainder ); // remove the unwanted backslashesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ( remainder != 0 )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // the trailing quotation mark is an escaped, literal quotation markDi2015NewLine                // add it to the buffer and increment the pointerDi2015NewLine                buf.Append( '"' );Di2015NewLine                ++i;Di2015NewLine            }                Di2015NewLine        }            Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Consume inter-argument whitespaceDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private void ConsumeWhitespace()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while ( i < cmd.Length && char.IsWhiteSpace( cmd[i] ) )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ++i;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }        Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CommandLineParser parser      = new CommandLineParser();Di2015NewLine        string            commandLine = RetrieveUnparsedCommandLine();Di2015NewLine        int i = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IEnumerable<string> args = parser.Parse( commandLine );Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine( "-------------------" );Di2015NewLine        foreach ( string arg in args )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string template = i > 0 ? "argv[0:#0]" : "command";Di2015NewLine            string label    = string.Format( template , i++ );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine( "{0}: {1}" , label , arg );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine( "-------------------------" );            Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static string RetrieveUnparsedCommandLine()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // get the raw command line. Source might be registry, config file, whateverDi2015NewLine        string commandLine = Environment.CommandLine;Di2015NewLine        return commandLine;Di2015NewLine    }       Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9269805Di2015UniqueSeparatorWAVEHDR header = new WAVEHDR();Di2015NewLine//Read or setup header data hereDi2015NewLineIntPtr headerPtr = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(Marshal.SizeOf(header));Di2015NewLineMarshal.StructureToPtr(header, headerPtr, true);Di2015NewLinewaveOutPrepareHeader(hWaveOut, headerPtr, (uint)Marshal.SizeOf(header));Di2015NewLine

9270264Di2015UniqueSeparator! given: (/(expr, start, end)/)Di2015NewLine!Di2015NewLine! (/(-1, i1=1, m-1)/) = vector, -1 repeated m-1 timesDi2015NewLine!Di2015NewLine! (/(i1, i1=2, m)/)   = vector, 2..mDi2015NewLine!Di2015NewLine! Both are vectors with m-1 termsDi2015NewLine
9270264Di2015UniqueSeparatorproduct()
9270264Di2015UniqueSeparator-1
9270264Di2015UniqueSeparatorm-1
9270264Di2015UniqueSeparatorm!
9270264Di2015UniqueSeparator// product((/(-1,i1=1,m-1)/)) => -1^m-1Di2015NewLinedouble i = (m % 2 == 0 ? -1 : 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// product((/(i1,i1=2,m)/))   => m!Di2015NewLinedouble mfact = i;Di2015NewLinefor (int jj = 2; jj < m; ++jj)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    mfact *= jj;Di2015NewLine} // C1 = mfact;Di2015NewLine

9281350Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> CartesianProduct<T>(this IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> sequences) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine  IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> emptyProduct = new[] { Enumerable.Empty<T>() }; Di2015NewLine  return sequences.Aggregate( Di2015NewLine    emptyProduct, Di2015NewLine    (accumulator, sequence) => Di2015NewLine      from accseq in accumulator Di2015NewLine      from item in sequence Di2015NewLine      select accseq.Concat(new[] {item})); Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9281759Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ColorizeAvalonEdit : DocumentColorizingTransformerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override void ColorizeLine(DocumentLine line)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int lineStartOffset = line.Offset;Di2015NewLine        string text = CurrentContext.Document.GetText(line);Di2015NewLine        int start = 0;Di2015NewLine        int index;Di2015NewLine        while ((index = text.IndexOf("AvalonEdit", start)) >= 0) {Di2015NewLine            base.ChangeLinePart(Di2015NewLine                lineStartOffset + index, // startOffsetDi2015NewLine                lineStartOffset + index + 10, // endOffsetDi2015NewLine                (VisualLineElement element) => {Di2015NewLine                    // This lambda gets called once for every VisualLineElementDi2015NewLine                    // between the specified offsets.Di2015NewLine                    Typeface tf = element.TextRunProperties.Typeface;Di2015NewLine                    // Replace the typeface with a modified version ofDi2015NewLine                    // the same typefaceDi2015NewLine                    element.TextRunProperties.SetTypeface(new Typeface(Di2015NewLine                        tf.FontFamily,Di2015NewLine                        FontStyles.Italic,Di2015NewLine                        FontWeights.Bold,Di2015NewLine                        tf.StretchDi2015NewLine                    ));Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLine            start = index + 1; // search for next occurrenceDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9281923Di2015UniqueSeparator// change this to any page size you want    Di2015NewLineRectangle defaultPageSize = PageSize.A4;   Di2015NewLineusing (Document document = new Document(defaultPageSize)) {Di2015NewLine  PdfWriter.GetInstance(document, STREAM);Di2015NewLine  document.Open();Di2015NewLine// if you don't account for the left/right margins, the image willDi2015NewLine// run off the current pageDi2015NewLine  float width = defaultPageSize.WidthDi2015NewLine    - document.RightMarginDi2015NewLine    - document.LeftMarginDi2015NewLine  ;Di2015NewLine  float height = defaultPageSize.HeightDi2015NewLine    - document.TopMarginDi2015NewLine    - document.BottomMarginDi2015NewLine  ;Di2015NewLine  foreach (string path in imagePaths) {Di2015NewLine    Image image = Image.GetInstance(path);Di2015NewLine    float h = image.ScaledHeight;Di2015NewLine    float w = image.ScaledWidth;Di2015NewLine    float scalePercent;Di2015NewLine// scale percentage is dependent on whether the image is Di2015NewLine// 'portrait' or 'landscape'        Di2015NewLine    if (h > w) {Di2015NewLine// only scale image if it's height is __greater__ thanDi2015NewLine// the document's height, accounting for marginsDi2015NewLine      if (h > height) {Di2015NewLine        scalePercent = height / h;Di2015NewLine        image.ScaleAbsolute(w * scalePercent, h * scalePercent);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else {Di2015NewLine// same for image width        Di2015NewLine      if (w > width) {Di2015NewLine        scalePercent = width / w;Di2015NewLine        image.ScaleAbsolute(w * scalePercent, h * scalePercent);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    document.Add(image);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9282917Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Transactions.TransactionScope
9282917Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic MembershipStatus Authenticate(string username, string password)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (TransactionScope scope = new TransactionScope(TransactionScopeOption.Required, new TransactionOptions { IsolationLevel = IsolationLevel.Snapshot }))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    MembershipUser user = Membership.GetUser(username);Di2015NewLine        if (user == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // user did not exist as of Membership.GetUserDi2015NewLine            return MembershipStatus.InvalidUsername;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (user.IsLockedOut)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // user was locked out as of Membership.GetUserDi2015NewLine            return MembershipStatus.AccountLockedOut;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (Membership.ValidateUser(username, password))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // user was valid as of Membership.ValidateUserDi2015NewLine            return MembershipStatus.Valid;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // user was not valid as of Membership.ValidateUser BUT we don't reallyDi2015NewLine        // know why because we don't have ISOLATION.  The user's status may have changedDi2015NewLine        // between the call to Membership.GetUser and Membership.ValidateUser.Di2015NewLine        return MembershipStatus.InvalidPassword;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

 _isAlreadyRun = true;Di2015NewLine        _maxRetryCount = retryCount;Di2015NewLine        _mailMessage = message;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SmtpClient client = new SmtpClient();Di2015NewLine        client.SendCompleted += SmtpClientSendCompleted;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SendMessage(client);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SendMessage(SmtpClient client) {Di2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            client.SendAsync(_mailMessage, Guid.NewGuid());Di2015NewLine        } catch (Exception exception) {Di2015NewLine            EndProcessing(client);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void EndProcessing (SmtpClient client) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_mailMessage != null) {Di2015NewLine            _mailMessage.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (client != null) {Di2015NewLine            client.SendCompleted -= SmtpClientSendCompleted;Di2015NewLine            client.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        OnSendCompleted(Di2015NewLine           new SendEmailCompletedEventArgs(null, false, null, _currentRetryCount)Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _isAlreadyRun = false;Di2015NewLine        _currentRetryCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SmtpClientSendCompleted(object sender, AsyncCompletedEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine        var smtpClient = (SmtpClient)sender;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(e.Error == null || _currentRetryCount >= _maxRetryCount) {Di2015NewLine            EndProcessing(smtpClient);Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            _currentRetryCount++;Di2015NewLine            SendMessage(smtpClient);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected virtual void OnSendCompleted(SendEmailCompletedEventArgs args) {Di2015NewLine        var handler = SendEmailCompleted;Di2015NewLine        if (handler != null) {Di2015NewLine            handler(this, args);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic delegate void SendEmailCompletedEventHandler(Di2015NewLine   object sender, SendEmailCompletedEventArgs e);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SendEmailCompletedEventArgs : AsyncCompletedEventArgs {Di2015NewLine    public SendEmailCompletedEventArgs(Di2015NewLine        Exception error,Di2015NewLine 9286419Di2015UniqueSeparator}
9286419Di2015UniqueSeparator(
9286419Di2015UniqueSeparator)
9286419Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace Example.SqlPreprocessorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ParserDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        enum SymbolDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            None,Di2015NewLine            LPar,Di2015NewLine            RPar,Di2015NewLine            Equals,Di2015NewLine            Text,Di2015NewLine            NumberIf,Di2015NewLine            If,Di2015NewLine            NumberElse,Di2015NewLine            NumberEnd,Di2015NewLine            IdentifierDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<string> _input; // Raw SQL with preprocessor directives.Di2015NewLine        int _currentLineIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Simulates variables used in conditionsDi2015NewLine        Dictionary<string, string> _variableValues = new Dictionary<string, string> { Di2015NewLine            { "VariableA", "Case1" },Di2015NewLine            { "VariableB", "CaseX" }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Symbol _sy; // Current symbol.Di2015NewLine        string _string; // Identifier or text line;Di2015NewLine        Queue<string> _textQueue = new Queue<string>(); // Buffered text parts of a single line.Di2015NewLine        int _lineNo; // Current line number for error messages.Di2015NewLine        string _line; // Current line for error messages.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Get the next line from the input.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>Input line or null if no more lines are available.</returns>Di2015NewLine        string GetLine()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_currentLineIndex >= _input.Count) {Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            _line = _input[_currentLineIndex++];Di2015NewLine            _lineNo = _currentLineIndex;Di2015NewLine            return _line;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Get the next symbol from the input stream and stores it in _sy.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        void GetSy()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string s;Di2015NewLine            if (_textQueue.Count > 0) { // Buffered text parts available, use one from these.Di2015NewLine                s = _textQueue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                switch (s.ToLower()) {Di2015NewLine                    case "(":Di2015NewLine                        _sy = Symbol.LPar;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    case ")":Di2015NewLine                        _sy = Symbol.RPar;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    case "=":Di2015NewLine                        _sy = Symbol.Equals;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    case "if":Di2015NewLine                        _sy = Symbol.If;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    default:Di2015NewLine                        _sy = Symbol.Identifier;Di2015NewLine                        _string = s;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get next line from input.Di2015NewLine            s = GetLine();Di2015NewLine            if (s == null) {Di2015NewLine                _sy = Symbol.None;Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            s = s.Trim(' ', '\\t');Di2015NewLine            if (s[0] == '#') { // We have a preprocessor directive.Di2015NewLine                // Split the line in order to be able get its symbols.Di2015NewLine                string[] parts = Regex.Split(s, @"\\b|[^#_a-zA-Z0-9()=]");Di2015NewLine                // parts[0] = #Di2015NewLine                // parts[1] = if, else, endDi2015NewLine                switch (parts[1].ToLower()) {Di2015NewLine                    case "if":Di2015NewLine                        _sy = Symbol.NumberIf;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    case "else":Di2015NewLine                        _sy = Symbol.NumberElse;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    case "end":Di2015NewLine                        _sy = Symbol.NumberEnd;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    default:Di2015NewLine                        Error("Invalid symbol #{0}", parts[0]);Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Store the remaining parts for later.Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 2; i < parts.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine                    string part = parts[i].Trim(' ', '\\t');Di2015NewLine                    if (part != "") {Di2015NewLine                        _textQueue.Enqueue(part);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            } else { // We have an ordinary SQL text line.Di2015NewLine                _sy = Symbol.Text;Di2015NewLine                _string = s;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void Error(string message, params  object[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Make sure parsing stops hereDi2015NewLine            _sy = Symbol.None;Di2015NewLine            _textQueue.Clear();Di2015NewLine            _input.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            message = String.Format(message, args) +Di2015NewLine                      String.Format(" in line {0}\\r\\n\\r\\n{1}", _lineNo, _line);Di2015NewLine            Output("------");Di2015NewLine            Output(message);Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show(message, "Error");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Writes the processed line to a (simulated) output stream.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="line">Line to be written to output</param>Di2015NewLine        void Output(string line)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(line);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Starts the parsing process.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public void Parse()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Simulate an input stream.Di2015NewLine            _input = new List<string> {Di2015NewLine                "select column1",Di2015NewLine                "from",Di2015NewLine                "#if(VariableA = Case1)",Di2015NewLine                "    #if(VariableB = Case3)",Di2015NewLine                "        table3",Di2015NewLine                "    #else",Di2015NewLine                "        table4",Di2015NewLine                "    #end",Di2015NewLine                "#else if(VariableA = Case2)",Di2015NewLine                "    table2",Di2015NewLine                "#else",Di2015NewLine                "    defaultTable",Di2015NewLine                "#end"Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Clear previous parsingDi2015NewLine            _textQueue.Clear();Di2015NewLine            _currentLineIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get first symbol and start parsingDi2015NewLine            GetSy();Di2015NewLine            if (LineSequence(true)) {Di2015NewLine                // TODO: OK do something with the processed sqlDi2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                Output("*** ABORTED ***");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The following methods parse according the the EBNF syntax.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool LineSequence(bool writeOutput)Di2015NewLine        {   Di2015NewLine            // EBNF:  LineSequence = { TextLine | IfStatement }.Di2015NewLine            while (_sy == Symbol.Text || _sy == Symbol.NumberIf) {Di2015NewLine                if (_sy == Symbol.Text) {Di2015NewLine                    if (!TextLine(writeOutput)) {Di2015NewLine                        return false;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                } else { // _sy == Symbol.NumberIfDi2015NewLine                    if (!IfStatement(writeOutput)) {Di2015NewLine                        return false;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool TextLine(bool writeOutput)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // EBNF:  TextLine = <string>.Di2015NewLine            if (writeOutput) {Di2015NewLine                Output(_string);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            GetSy();Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool IfStatement(bool writeOutput)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // EBNF:  IfStatement = IfLine LineSequence { ElseIfLine LineSequence } [ ElseLine LineSequence ] EndLine.Di2015NewLine            bool result;Di2015NewLine            if (IfLine(out result) && LineSequence(writeOutput && result)) {Di2015NewLine                writeOutput &= !result; // Only one section can produce an output.Di2015NewLine                while (_sy == Symbol.NumberElse) {Di2015NewLine                    GetSy();Di2015NewLine                    if (_sy == Symbol.If) { // We have an #else ifDi2015NewLine                        if (!ElseIfLine(out result)) {Di2015NewLine                            return false;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        if (!LineSequence(writeOutput && result)) {Di2015NewLine                            return false;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        writeOutput &= !result; // Only one section can produce an output.Di2015NewLine                    } else { // We have a simple #elseDi2015NewLine                        if (!LineSequence(writeOutput)) {Di2015NewLine                            return false;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        break; // We can have only one #else statement.Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (_sy != Symbol.NumberEnd) {Di2015NewLine                    Error("'#end' expected");Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                GetSy();Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool IfLine(out bool result)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // EBNF:  IfLine = "#if" "(" Condition ")".Di2015NewLine            result = false;Di2015NewLine            GetSy();Di2015NewLine            if (_sy != Symbol.LPar) {Di2015NewLine                Error("'(' expected");Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            GetSy();Di2015NewLine            if (!Condition(out result)) {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (_sy != Symbol.RPar) {Di2015NewLine                Error("')' expected");Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            GetSy();Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private bool Condition(out bool result)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // EBNF:  Condition = Identifier "=" Identifier.Di2015NewLine            string variable;Di2015NewLine            string expectedValue;Di2015NewLine            string variableValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            result = false;Di2015NewLine            // Identifier "=" IdentifierDi2015NewLine            if (_sy != Symbol.Identifier) {Di2015NewLine                Error("Identifier expected");Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            variable = _string; // The first identifier is a variable.Di2015NewLine            GetSy();Di2015NewLine            if (_sy != Symbol.Equals) {Di2015NewLine                Error("'=' expected");Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            GetSy();Di2015NewLine            if (_sy != Symbol.Identifier) {Di2015NewLine                Error("Value expected");Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            expectedValue = _string;  // The second identifier is a value.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Search the variableDi2015NewLine            if (_variableValues.TryGetValue(variable, out variableValue)) {Di2015NewLine                result = variableValue == expectedValue; // Perform the comparison.Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                Error("Variable '{0}' not found", variable);Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            GetSy();Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool ElseIfLine(out bool result)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // EBNF:  ElseIfLine = "#else" "if" "(" Condition ")".Di2015NewLine            result = false;Di2015NewLine            GetSy(); // "#else" already processed here, we are only called if the symbol is "if"Di2015NewLine            if (_sy != Symbol.LPar) {Di2015NewLine                Error("'(' expected");Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            GetSy();Di2015NewLine            if (!Condition(out result)) {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (_sy != Symbol.RPar) {Di2015NewLine                Error("')' expected");Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            GetSy();Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9288758Di2015UniqueSeparator        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Converts IList object to DatatableDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <typeparam name="T"> name of the class - List Type</typeparam>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="pList"> IList object</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>Datatable</returns>Di2015NewLine        public static DataTable ConvertTo<T>(IList<T> pList)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DataTable table = CreateTable<T>();Di2015NewLine            Type entityType = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine            PropertyDescriptorCollection properties = TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(entityType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (T item in pList)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DataRow row = table.NewRow();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (PropertyDescriptor prop in properties)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    row[prop.Name] = prop.GetValue(item);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                table.Rows.Add(row);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return table;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

9297896Di2015UniqueSeparator#pragma onceDi2015NewLine#include <exception>Di2015NewLine#include "leveldb\\db.h"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing namespace System::Runtime::InteropServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Create the namespaceDi2015NewLinenamespace LevelDBWrapperNS Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Note that size_t changes depending on the target platform of your build:Di2015NewLine    // for 32-bit builds, size_t is a 32-bit unsigned integer.Di2015NewLine    // for 64-bit builds, size_t is a 64-bit unsigned integer.Di2015NewLine    // There is no size_t equivalent in C#, but there are ways toDi2015NewLine    // mimic the same behavior. Alternately, you can change theDi2015NewLine    // size_t to unsigned long for 32-bit builds or unsigned long long (64-bit)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Declare the leveldb wrapperDi2015NewLine    public ref class LevelDBWrapperDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    private:Di2015NewLine        leveldb::DB*        _db;Di2015NewLine    public:Di2015NewLine        LevelDBWrapper(const std::string dataDirectory);Di2015NewLine        ~LevelDBWrapper();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // A get method which given a key, puts data in the value arrayDi2015NewLine        // and sets the valueSize according to the size of the data itDi2015NewLine        // allocated. Note: you will have to deallocate the data in C#Di2015NewLine        void Get(const char* key, const size_t keySize, char* value, size_t &valueSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // A put method which takes in strings instead of char*Di2015NewLine        bool Put(const std::string key, const std::string value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // A put method which takes in char* pointersDi2015NewLine        bool Put(const char* key, const size_t keySize, const char* value, const size_t valueSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // A delete methodDi2015NewLine        bool Delete(const char* key, const size_t keySize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private:Di2015NewLine        void Open(const char* dataDirectory);Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9297896Di2015UniqueSeparator#include "LevelDBWrapper.h"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Use the same namespace as the headerDi2015NewLinenamespace LevelDBWrapperNSDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    LevelDBWrapper::LevelDBWrapper(const std::string dataDirectory)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Open(dataDirectory.c_str());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    LevelDBWrapper::~LevelDBWrapper()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(_db!=NULL)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            delete _db;Di2015NewLine            _db= NULL;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // NOTE: don't forget to delete the block cache too!!!Di2015NewLine        /*if(options.block_cache != NULL)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            delete options.block_cache;Di2015NewLine            options.block_cache = NULL;Di2015NewLine        }*/Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool LevelDBWrapper::Put(const char* key, const size_t keySize, const char* value, const size_t valueSize)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        leveldb::Slice sKey(key, keySize);Di2015NewLine        leveldb::Slice sValue(value, valueSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _db->Put(leveldb::WriteOptions(), sKey, sValue).ok();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void LevelDBWrapper::Open(const char* dataDirectory)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        leveldb::Options    options;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a database environment. This will enable caching between Di2015NewLine        // separate calls (and improve performance). This also enables Di2015NewLine        // the db_stat.exe command which allows cache tuning. Open Di2015NewLine        // transactional environment leveldb::Options options;Di2015NewLine        options.create_if_missing = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Open the database if it existsDi2015NewLine        options.error_if_exists = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // 64 Mb read cacheDi2015NewLine        options.block_cache = leveldb::NewLRUCache(64 * 1024 * 1024);   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Writes will be flushed every 32 MbDi2015NewLine        options.write_buffer_size = 32 * 1024 * 1024;   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If you do a lot of bulk operations it may be good to increase the Di2015NewLine        // block size to a 64k block size. A power of 2 block size also Di2015NewLine        // also improves the compression rate when using Snappy.Di2015NewLine        options.block_size = 64 * 1024; Di2015NewLine        options.max_open_files = 500;Di2015NewLine        options.compression = leveldb::kNoCompression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _db = NULL;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Open the databaseDi2015NewLine        leveldb::Status status = leveldb::DB::Open(options, dataDirectory, &_db);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Check if there was a failureDi2015NewLine        if(!status.ok())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // The database failed to open!Di2015NewLine            if(status.ToString().find("partial record without end")!=std::string::npos)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Attempting to recover the database...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                status = leveldb::RepairDB(dataDirectory, options);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if(status.ok())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Successfully recovered the database! Attempting to reopen... Di2015NewLine                    status = leveldb::DB::Open( options, dataDirectory, &_db);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Failed to recover the database!Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Throw an exception if the failure was unrecoverable!Di2015NewLine            if(!status.ok())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw std::runtime_error(std::string("Unable to open: ") + std::string(dataDirectory) + Di2015NewLine                    std::string(" ") + status.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9297896Di2015UniqueSeparator// Returns a buffer containing the data and sets the bufferLen.Di2015NewLine// The user must specify the key and the length of the key so a sliceDi2015NewLine// can be constructed and sent to leveldb.Di2015NewLineconst unsigned char* Get(const char* key, const size_t keyLength, [Out]size_t %bufferLen);Di2015NewLine
9297896Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst unsigned char* LevelDBWrapper::Get(const char* key, const size_t keyLength, [Out]size_t %bufferLen)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    unsigned char* buffer = NULL;Di2015NewLine    std::string value;Di2015NewLine    leveldb::Status s = db->Get(leveldb::ReadOptions(), Slice(key, keyLength), &value);Di2015NewLine    if(s.ok())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // we found the key, so set the buffer length Di2015NewLine        bufferLen = value.size();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // initialize the bufferDi2015NewLine        buffer = new unsigned char[bufferLen];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // set the bufferDi2015NewLine        memset(buffer, 0, bufferLen);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // copy the dataDi2015NewLine        memcpy(memcpy((void*)(buffer), value.c_str(), bufferLen);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // The buffer length is 0 because a key was not foundDi2015NewLine        bufferLen = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return buffer;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9297896Di2015UniqueSeparatorUnmanagedMemoryStream
9297896Di2015UniqueSeparatorUInt32 bufferLen = 0;Di2015NewLinebyte* buffer = dbInstance.Get(key, keyLength, out bufferLen);Di2015NewLineUnmanagedMemoryStream ums = new UnmanagedMemoryStream(buffer, (Int32)bufferLen, (Int32)bufferLen, FileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Create a byte array to hold data from unmanaged memory.Di2015NewLinebyte[] data = new byte [bufferLen];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Read from unmanaged memory to the byte array.Di2015NewLinereadStream.Read(data , 0, bufferLen);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Don't forget to free the block of unmanaged memory!!!Di2015NewLineMarshal.FreeHGlobal(buffer);Di2015NewLine

"" : longString);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Stopwatch sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        list.Where(r=> !string.IsNullOrEmpty(r.Trim())).ToList();Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("IsNullOrEmpty(Trim): {0}", sw.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        GC.Collect();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        list.Where(r=> !string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(r)).ToList();Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("IsNullOrWhitespace: {0}", sw.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        GC.Collect();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        List<string> listResult = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        int countList = list.Count;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < countList; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string item = list[i];Di2015NewLine            if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(item))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                listResult.Add(item);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("New list: {0}", sw.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        GC.Collect();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This has to be last, as it modifies in-place Di2015NewLine        sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        list.RemoveAll(r => string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(r));Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("List.RemoveAll: {0}", sw.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine    }        Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

CRYPT_NEWKEYSET))Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine      RaiseLastOSError;Di2015NewLine  end;Di2015NewLineend;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction __AES128_DeriveKeyFromPassword(m_hProv: HCRYPTPROV; Password: string): HCRYPTKEY;Di2015NewLinevarDi2015NewLine  hHash: HCRYPTHASH;Di2015NewLine  Mode: DWORD;Di2015NewLinebeginDi2015NewLine  Win32Check(CryptCreateHash(m_hProv, CALG_SHA_256, 0, 0, hHash));Di2015NewLine  tryDi2015NewLine    Win32Check(CryptHashData(hHash, PChar(Password), Length(Password) * SizeOf(Char), 0));Di2015NewLine    Win32Check(CryptDeriveKey(m_hProv, CALG_AES_128, hHash, 0, Result));Di2015NewLine    // Wine uses a different default mode of CRYPT_MODE_EBCDi2015NewLine    Mode := CRYPT_MODE_CBC;Di2015NewLine    Win32Check(CryptSetKeyParam(Result, KP_MODE, Pointer(@Mode), 0));Di2015NewLine  finallyDi2015NewLine    CryptDestroyHash(hHash);Di2015NewLine  end;Di2015NewLineend;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction AES128_Encrypt(Value, Password: string): string;Di2015NewLinevarDi2015NewLine  hCProv: HCRYPTPROV;Di2015NewLine  hKey: HCRYPTKEY;Di2015NewLine  lul_datalen: Integer;Di2015NewLine  lul_buflen: Integer;Di2015NewLine  Buffer: TBytes;Di2015NewLinebeginDi2015NewLine  Assert(Password <> '');Di2015NewLine  if (Value = '') thenDi2015NewLine    Result := ''Di2015NewLine  else beginDi2015NewLine    hCProv := __CryptAcquireContext(PROV_RSA_AES);Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine      hKey := __AES128_DeriveKeyFromPassword(hCProv, Password);Di2015NewLine      tryDi2015NewLine        // allocate buffer spaceDi2015NewLine        lul_datalen := Length(Value) * SizeOf(Char);Di2015NewLine        Buffer := TEncoding.Unicode.GetBytes(Value + '        ');Di2015NewLine        lul_buflen := 9299687Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ConvertToXmlCharacterReference( this string xml )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  StringBuilder sb  = new StringBuilder( s.Length ) ;Di2015NewLine  const char    SP  = '\\u0020' ; // anything lower than SP is a control characterDi2015NewLine  const char    DEL = '\\u007F' ; // anything above DEL isn't ASCII, per se.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  foreach( char ch in xml )Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    bool isPrintableAscii = ch >= SP && ch <= DEL ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if ( isPrintableAscii ) { sb.Append(ch)                             ; }Di2015NewLine    else                    { sb.AppendFormat( "&#x{0:X4}" , (int) ch ) ; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  string instance = sb.ToString() ;Di2015NewLine  return instance ;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

       User32.DestroyIcon(shfi.hIcon);     // CleanupDi2015NewLine            return icon;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Used to access 9302514Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineusing TreeViewTestProject.Utilities;Di2015NewLineusing                                                                                      #region ExplorerNodeSorter ClassDi2015NewLine    private class ExplorerNodeSorter : IComparerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int Compare(object x, object y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TreeNode nx = x as TreeNode;Di2015NewLine            TreeNode ny = y as TreeNode;Di2015NewLine            bool nxDir = (nx.ImageKey == kDirectoryImageKey);Di2015NewLine            bool nyDir = (ny.ImageKey == kDirectoryImageKey);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              return 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return string.Compare(nx.Text, ny.Text);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private const string kDirectoryImageKey = "directory";Di2015NewLine        private const string kReplacementText   = "C43C65D1-D40F-46F0-BC5E-57265322DDFC";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ExplorerTreeView()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine            this.BeginUpdate();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string rootDir      = DirectoryName;Di2015NewLine            TreeNode rootNode   =     {Di2015NewLine            FileAttributes attr = File.GetAttributes(FullPath);Di2015NewLine            return ((attr & FileAttributes.Directory) == FileAttributes.Directory);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private TreeNode CreateTreeNode(string FullPath)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string key  = FullPath.ToLower();Di2015NewLine            string name = "";Di2015NewLine            object tag  = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(PathIsDirectory(key))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DirectoryInfo info = new DirectoryInfo(FullPath);Di2015NewLine                key     = kDirectoryImageKey;Di2015NewLine                name    = info.Name;Di2015NewLine                tag     = info;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                FileInfo info = new FileInfo(FullPath);Di2015NewLine                name    = info.Name;Di2015NewLine "directory")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    m_FileIcons.Images.Add(key, IconReader.GetFolderIcon(Environment.CurrentDirectory, IconReader.IconSize.Small, IconReader.FolderType.Open).ToBitmap());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    m_FileIcons.Images.Add(key, IconReader.GetFileIcon(FullPath, IconReader.IconSize.Small, false));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TreeNode node           = new TreeNode(name);            Di2015NewLine            node.Tag                = tag;Di2015NewLine            node.ImageKey           = key;Di2015NewLine            node.SelectedImageKey   = key;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return node;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void PopulateDirectory(TreeNode ParentNode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DirectoryInfo parentInfo = ParentNode.Tag as DirectoryInfo;Di2015NewLine            foreach(DirectoryInfo subDir in parentInfo.GetDirectories())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TreeNode child = CreateTreeNode(subDir.FullName);Di2015NewLine                PopulateForExpansion(child);Di2015NewLine                ParentNode.Nodes.Add(child);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach(FileInfo file in parentInfo.GetFiles())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ParentNode.Nodes.Add(CreateTreeNode(file.FullName));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void PopulateForExpansion(TreeNode ParentNode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // We need the +/- to show up if this directory isn't empty... but only want to populate the node on demandDi2015NewLine            DirectoryInfo parentInfo = ParentNode.Tag as DirectoryInfo;Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if((parentInfo.GetDirectories().Length > 0) || (parentInfo.GetFiles().Length > 0))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ParentNode.Nodes.Add(kReplacementText);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch { }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void ReplacePlaceholderDirectoryNode(TreeNode ParentNode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if((ParentNode.Nodes.Count == 1) && (ParentNode.Nodes[0].Text == kReplacementText))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ParentNode.Nodes.Clear();Di2015NewLine                PopulateDirectory(ParentNode);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void ExplorerTreeView_BeforeExpand(object sender, TreeViewCancelEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.BeginUpdate();Di2015NewLine            ReplacePlaceholderDirectoryNode(e.Node);Di2015NewLine            this.EndUpdate();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9302514Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing.Drawing2D;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace TreeViewTestProjectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public partial class TreeViewEx : TreeViewDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Notes: TextRenderer uses GDI to render the text, whereas Graphics uses GDI+.  "TreeView" has existed for a long long timeDi2015NewLine        // and thus uses GDI under the covers.  For User Drawing TreeNode's, we need to make sure we use the TextRenderer versionDi2015NewLine        // of text rendering functions.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private bool m_ShowLines = true;Di2015NewLine        public new bool ShowLines           // marked as 'new' to replace base functionality }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override CreateParams CreateParamsDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Removes all the flickering of repainting node'sDi2015NewLine                // This is the only thing I found that works properly for doublebuffering a treeview.Di2015NewLine                CreateParams cp = ShowLines must be "false" for FullRowSelect to work - so we're overriding the variable to correct for that.Di2015NewLine            base.ShowLines = false;Di2015NewLine            this.FullRowSelect = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(e.Node.Bounds.IsEmpty) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Clear out the previous contents for the node.  If we don't do this, when you mousehover the font will get slightly more boldDi2015NewLine            Rectangle bounds = new Rectangle(0, e.Node.Bounds.Y, this.Width - 1, e.Node.Bounds.Height - 1);Di2015NewLine            e.Graphics.FillRectangle(SystemBrushes.Window, bounds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Draw everythingDi2015NewLine            DrawNodeFocusedHighlight(e);Di2015NewLine            DrawNodeLines(e);Di2015NewLine            DrawPlusMinus(e);Di2015NewLine            DrawNodeIcon(e);Di2015NewLine            DrawNodeText(e);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void DrawNodeFocusedHighlight(DrawTreeNodeEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(SelectedNode != e.Node) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int scrollWidth = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(VScrollVisible())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                scrollWidth = SystemInformation.VerticalScrollBarWidth;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Rectangle bounds = new Rectangle(0, e.Node.Bounds.Y, this.Width - scrollWidth, e.Node.Bounds.Height - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(!e.Node.IsEditing)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                e.Graphics.FillRectangle(SystemBrushes.Highlight, bounds);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using(Pen focusPen = new Pen(Color.Black))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                focusPen.DashStyle = SelectionDashStyle;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bounds = new Rectangle(0, e.Node.Bounds.Y, this.Width - scrollWidth - 5, e.Node.Bounds.Height - 2);Di2015NewLine                e.Graphics.DrawRectangle(focusPen, bounds);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void DrawNodeText(DrawTreeNodeEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(e.Node.Bounds.IsEmpty) return;Di2015NewLine            if(e.Node.IsEditing) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Rectangle bounds = e.Node.Bounds;Di2015NewLine            using(Font font = e.Node.NodeFont)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bounds.Width = TextRenderer.MeasureText(e.Node.Text, font).Width;Di2015NewLine                bounds.Y -= 1;Di2015NewLine                bounds.X += 1;Di2015NewLine                if(IsRootNode(e.Node))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    bounds = new Rectangle(this.Margin.Size.Width + Properties.Resources.minus.Width + 9, 0, bounds.Width, bounds.Height);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine e.Node.IsSelected?SystemColors.HighlightText:this.ForeColor;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                TextRenderer.DrawText(e.Graphics, e.Node.Text, font, bounds, fontColor);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private bool IsRootNode(TreeNode Node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (Node.Level == 0 && Node.PrevNode == null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void DrawNodeLines(DrawTreeNodeEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(IsRootNode(e.Node)) return;Di2015NewLine            if(!ShowLines) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Pen linePen       = new Pen(Color.Black);Di2015NewLine            linePen.DashStyle = LineStyle;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for(int x = 0; x < e.Node.Level; x++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine if(ShouldDrawVerticalLineForLevel(e.Node, x))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    e.Graphics.DrawLine(linePen, xLoc, e.Bounds.Top, xLoc, e.Bounds.Top + height);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Draw the half line for the last nodeDi2015NewLine            if(e.Node.Parent.LastNode == e.Node)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int halfLoc = (e.Node.Level * this.Indent) + (Properties.Resources.minus.Width / 2);Di2015NewLine                e.Graphics.DrawLine(linePen, halfLoc, e.Bounds.Top, halfLoc, (e.Bounds.Top + e.Bounds.Height / 2) - 1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private bool ShouldDrawVerticalLineForLevel(TreeNode Current, int Level)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TreeNode node = Current;Di2015NewLine            TreeNode c = Current;Di2015NewLine            while(node.Level != Level)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                c = node;Di2015NewLine                node = node.Parent;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return !(node.LastNode == c);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void DrawNodeLineHorizontal(DrawTreeNodeEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(IsRootNode(e.Node)) return;Di2015NewLine (Properties.Resources.minus.Width / 2);Di2015NewLine            int midY            = (e.Bounds.Top + e.Bounds.Bottom) / 2 - 1;Di2015NewLine            e.Graphics.DrawLine(linePen, xLoc, midY, xLoc + 7, midY);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void DrawNodeIcon(DrawTreeNodeEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(this.ImageList == null)
