          int imgIndex = this.ImageList.Images.IndexOfKey(e.Node.ImageKey);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(!IsRootNode(e.Node))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine e.Bounds.Height / 2) - (img.Height / 2) - 1;Di2015NewLine                    e.Graphics.DrawImage(img, new Rectangle(iconLeft, y, img.Width, img.Height), new Rectangle(0, 0, img.Width, img.Height), GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void DrawPlusMinus(DrawTreeNodeEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(e.Node.Nodes.Count == 0) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int indent = (e.Node.Level * this.Indent) + this.Margin.Size.Width;Di2015NewLine            int }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private bool VScrollVisible()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int style = GetWindowLong(this.Handle, GWL_STYLE);Di2015NewLine            return ((style 9305389Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int GetUserCount(string alpha, string search, bool byEmail, int startRowIndex, int maximumRows)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var users = Membership.GetAllUsers().Cast<MembershipUser>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (alpha != null && search == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        users = users.Where(x => x.UserName.StartsWith(alpha) == true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (search != null && !byEmail)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        users = users.FindUsersByName(search).Cast<MembershipUser>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        users = users.FindUsersByEmail(search);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return users.Count();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9306352Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string RemoveSpaces(string arg)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int newLength = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Calculate number of characters that arent spaces.Di2015NewLine    foreach (char ch in arg)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ch != ' ')//If not a space,Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            newLength++;//then increment number of characters.Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Now use that number as size in new arrayDi2015NewLine    char[] newString = new char[newLength];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Copy characters that arent spaces to the new char array.Di2015NewLine    int pos = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (char ch in arg)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ch != ' ')//If element e is NOT a space,Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            newString[pos++] = ch;//then copy that element to newString.Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new string(newString);//Done!Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9311643Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyCustomComparer : IComparer<FileInfo>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Compare(FileInfo x, FileInfo y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // split filenameDi2015NewLine        string[] parts1 = x.Name.Split('-');Di2015NewLine        string[] parts2 = y.Name.Split('-');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // calculate how much leading zeros we needDi2015NewLine        int toPad1 = 10 - parts1[0].Length;Di2015NewLine        int toPad2 = 10 - parts2[0].Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // add the zeros, only for sortingDi2015NewLine        parts1[0] = parts1[0].Insert(0, new String('0', toPad1));Di2015NewLine        parts2[0] = parts2[0].Insert(0, new String('0', toPad2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create the comparable stringDi2015NewLine        string toCompare1 = string.Join("", parts1);Di2015NewLine        string toCompare2 = string.Join("", parts2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // compareDi2015NewLine        return toCompare1.CompareTo(toCompare2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9314264Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void Excel_FromDataTable(DataTable dt)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Create an Excel object and add workbook...Di2015NewLine    Excel.ApplicationClass excel = new Excel.ApplicationClass();Di2015NewLine    Excel.Workbook workbook = excel.Application.Workbooks.Add(true); // true for object template???Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add column headings...Di2015NewLine    int iCol = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (DataColumn c in dt.Columns)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        iCol++;Di2015NewLine        excel.Cells[1, iCol] = c.ColumnName;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // for each row of data...Di2015NewLine    int iRow = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (DataRow r in dt.Rows)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        iRow++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // add each row's cell data...Di2015NewLine        iCol = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (DataColumn c in dt.Columns)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            iCol++;Di2015NewLine            excel.Cells[iRow + 1, iCol] = r[c.ColumnName];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Global missing reference for objects we are not defining...Di2015NewLine    object missing = System.Reflection.Missing.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If wanting to Save the workbook...Di2015NewLine    workbook.SaveAs("MyExcelWorkBook.xls",Di2015NewLine    Excel.XlFileFormat.xlXMLSpreadsheet, missing, missing,Di2015NewLine    false, false, Excel.XlSaveAsAccessMode.xlNoChange,Di2015NewLine    missing, missing, missing, missing, missing);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If wanting to make Excel visible and activate the worksheet...Di2015NewLine    excel.Visible = true;Di2015NewLine    Excel.Worksheet worksheet = (Excel.Worksheet)excel.ActiveSheet;Di2015NewLine    ((Excel._Worksheet)worksheet).Activate();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If wanting excel to shutdown...Di2015NewLine    ((Excel._Application)excel).Quit();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

new List<KeyValuePair<char, int>>();Di2015NewLine        var temp = new List<KeyValuePair<char, int>>(itemset);Di2015NewLine        if (itemset.Count == OriginValues.Count / PAIRCOUNT)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Add(temp);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < PAIRCOUNT; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            temp.Add(OriginValues[itemset.Count * PAIRCOUNT + x]);Di2015NewLine            Recurse(OriginValues, ref result,  temp);Di2015NewLine            temp = new List<KeyValuePair<char, int>>(itemset);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

9318687Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunction ShiftArray(ThisArray() As Variant) As Variant    Di2015NewLine    Dim lb As Long, ub As LongDi2015NewLine    Dim NewArray() As VariantDi2015NewLine    Dim i As LongDi2015NewLine    lb = LBound(ThisArray)Di2015NewLine    ub = UBound(ThisArray)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ReDim NewArray(0 To (ub - lb))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    For i = 0 To (ub - lb)Di2015NewLine        NewArray(i) = ThisArray(i + lb)Di2015NewLine    Next iDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ShiftArray = NewArray    Di2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine

9319725Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic unsafe static Bitmap Clone32BPPBitmap(Bitmap srcBitmap)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Bitmap result = new Bitmap(srcBitmap.Width, srcBitmap.Height, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Rectangle bmpBounds = new Rectangle(0, 0, srcBitmap.Width, srcBitmap.Height);Di2015NewLine    BitmapData srcData = srcBitmap.LockBits(bmpBounds, ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, srcBitmap.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLine    BitmapData resData = result.LockBits(bmpBounds, ImageLockMode.WriteOnly, result.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     int* srcScan0 = (int*)srcData.Scan0;Di2015NewLine     int* resScan0 = (int*)resData.Scan0;Di2015NewLine     int numPixels = srcData.Stride / 4 * srcData.Height;Di2015NewLine     tryDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         for (int p = 0; p < numPixels; p++)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine             resScan0[p] = srcScan0[p];Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     finallyDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         srcBitmap.UnlockBits(srcData);Di2015NewLine         result.UnlockBits(resData);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9319725Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Bitmap Copy32BPPBitmapSafe(Bitmap srcBitmap)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Bitmap result = new Bitmap(srcBitmap.Width, srcBitmap.Height, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Rectangle bmpBounds = new Rectangle(0, 0, srcBitmap.Width, srcBitmap.Height);Di2015NewLine    BitmapData srcData = srcBitmap.LockBits(bmpBounds, ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, srcBitmap.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLine    BitmapData resData = result.LockBits(bmpBounds, ImageLockMode.WriteOnly, result.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Int64 srcScan0 = srcData.Scan0.ToInt64();Di2015NewLine    Int64 resScan0 = resData.Scan0.ToInt64();Di2015NewLine    int srcStride = srcData.Stride;Di2015NewLine    int resStride = resData.Stride;Di2015NewLine    int rowLength = Math.Abs(srcData.Stride);Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[rowLength];Di2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < srcData.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Marshal.Copy(new IntPtr(srcScan0 + y * srcStride), buffer, 0, rowLength);Di2015NewLine            Marshal.Copy(buffer, 0, new IntPtr(resScan0 + y * resStride), rowLength);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        srcBitmap.UnlockBits(srcData);Di2015NewLine        result.UnlockBits(resData);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine

9321352Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass PartialApplier : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly ConstantExpression value;Di2015NewLine    private readonly ParameterExpression replace;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private PartialApplier(ParameterExpression replace, object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.replace = replace;Di2015NewLine        this.value = Expression.Constant(value, value.GetType());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override Expression Visit(Expression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var parameter = node as ParameterExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (parameter != null && parameter.Equals(replace))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else return base.Visit(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T2,TResult>> PartialApply<T,T2,TResult>(Expression<Func<T,T2,TResult>> expression, T value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = new PartialApplier(expression.Parameters.First(), value).Visit(expression.Body);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (Expression<Func<T2,TResult>>)Expression.Lambda(result, expression.Parameters.Skip(1));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
9321352Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void CudOperation<T>(this DataContext ctx,Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T> oldCollection,Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T> newCollection,Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<T, T, bool>> predicate)Di2015NewLine    where T : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var compiled = predicate.Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var old in oldCollection)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!newCollection.Any(o => compiled(o, old)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var applied = PartialApplier.PartialApply(predicate, old);Di2015NewLine            ctx.GetTable<T>().DeleteAllOnSubmit(ctx.GetTable<T>().Where(applied));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var newItem in newCollection)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var existingItem = oldCollection.SingleOrDefault(o => compiled(o, newItem));Di2015NewLine        if (existingItem != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ctx.GetTable<T>().Attach(newItem, existingItem);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ctx.GetTable<T>().InsertOnSubmit(newItem);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

9323702Di2015UniqueSeparator// The following ifdef block is the standard way of creating macros which make exporting Di2015NewLine// from a DLL simpler. All files within this DLL are compiled with the DLL_EXPORTSDi2015NewLine// symbol defined on the command line. This symbol should not be defined on any projectDi2015NewLine// that uses this DLL. 9328105Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int GetIntegerDigitCount(int valueInt)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double value = valueInt;Di2015NewLine    int sign = 0;Di2015NewLine    if (value < 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        value = -value;Di2015NewLine        sign = 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (value <= 9)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return sign + 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (value <= 99)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return sign + 2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (value <= 999)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return sign + 3;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (value <= 9999)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return sign + 4;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (value <= 99999)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return sign + 5;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (value <= 999999)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return sign + 6;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (value <= 9999999)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return sign + 7;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (value <= 99999999)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return sign + 8;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (value <= 999999999)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return sign + 9;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return sign + 10;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
